anya-e1202n:22_0: Vattabbameva ca bahumpi yato na vuttaṃ
anya-e1202n:25_0: Vuccamānaṃ mayā sādhu vaṃsaṃ thūpassa satthunoti;
anya-e1202n:26_0: Tattha thūpassa vaṃsaṃ vakkhāmīti ettha tathāgato arahaṃ sammā sambuddho thūpāraho,
anya-e1202n:26_3: rājā cakkavatti thūpārahoti vacanato thūpārahānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ dhātuyo patiṭṭhāpetvā kata cetiyaṃ abbhunana taṭṭhena thūpoti vuccati,
anya-e1202n:26_4: idha pana kañcana mālika mahāthūpo adhippeto,
anya-e1202n:26_5: so kassa dhātuyo patiṭṭhāpetvā katoti ce?
anya-e1202n:26_6: Yodīpaṅkarādīnaṃ catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṃ santike laddhavyākaraṇo samatiṃsapāramiyo pūretvā paramābhisambodhiṃ
anya-e1202n:26_7: patvā dhammacakkappavattanato paṭṭhāya yāva suhadda paribbājaka vinayāna sabba buddhakiccāni niṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e1202n:26_8: anupādiyesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto tassa bhagavato arahato sammā sambuddhassa dhātuyo patiṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e1202n:27_1: Ito kira kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkheyyānaṃ matthake amaravatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
anya-e1202n:27_3: So aññaṃ kammaṃ akatvā brahmaṇasippameva uggaṇhi tassa daharakāleyeva mātāpitaro kālamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:27_4: Athassa rāsivaḍḍhanako amacco āya potthakaṃ āharitvā suvaṇṇa rajata maṇimuttādi bharite gabbhe vivaritvā ettakaṃ te kumāra mātu santakaṃ,
anya-e1202n:27_6: ettakaṃ ayyaka payyakānanti yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā dhakaṃ ācikkhitvā etampaṭijaggāhīti āha.
anya-e1202n:27_7: So sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā agāraṃ ajjhāvasanto ekadivasaṃ cintesi.
anya-e1202n:28_2: tathā nibbatta nibbattaṭṭhāne sarīrabhedanaṃ ahañca jānidhammo jarādhammo vyādhidhammo maraṇadhammo.
anya-e1202n:28_3: Evaṃ bhūtena mayā ajāti ajaraṃ avyādhiṃ amaraṇaṃ sukhaṃ sītalaṃ nibbānaṃ gavesituṃ vaṭṭatīti nekkhammakāraṇaṃ
anya-e1202n:28_4: cintetvā puna cintesi imaṃ dhanaṃ sabbaṃ mayhaṃ pitu pitāmahādayo paralokaṃ gacchantā eka kahāpaṇampi
anya-e1202n:28_5: gahetvā nagatā mayā pana gahetvā gamanakāraṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā mahājanassa dānaṃ
anya-e1202n:28_6: datvā himavantassa pavisitvā tāpasa pabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā sattāhabbhantareyeva abhiññā ca samāpattiyo
anya-e1202n:29_0: Tadā dīpaṅkaro nāma satthā parayābhisambodhiṃ patvā satta sattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeceva vitināmetvā sunaṇdārāme
anya-e1202n:29_1: dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā koṭisattānaṃ devamanussānaṃ dhammamataṃ pāyetvā cātuddīpika mahāmegho viya dhammavassaṃ
anya-e1202n:29_2: vassento catūhi khīṇāsaya satasahassehi parivuto anupubbena cārakaṃ caramāno ramma nagaraṃ patvā sudassana
anya-e1202n:29_3: mahāvihāre paṭivasati tadā rammanagaravāsino sappi phaṇitādīni bhesajjāni gahetvā puppha dhūpa gaṇdhahatthā
anya-e1202n:29_4: yena buddho tenapasaṅkamitvā satthāraṃ vaṇditvā pupphādīhi pūjetvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā dhammaṃ sutvā
anya-e1202n:29_5: svātanāya bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā dasabalaṃ padakkhīnaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:30_0: Te puna divase asadisa mahādānaṃ sajjetvā dasabalassa āgamana maggaṃ sodhenti.
anya-e1202n:30_1: Tasmiṃ kāle sumedhatāpaso attano assama padato uggantvā rammanagaravāsīnaṃ tesaṃ manussānaṃ uparibhāgena
anya-e1202n:30_2: ākāsena gacchantā te haṭṭhapahaṭṭhe maggaṃ sodhente disvā kinnu kho kāraṇanti cintento sabbesaṃ passantānaṃyeva
anya-e1202n:30_3: ākāsato oru ekamante ṭhatthāyaha te manusse pucchi.’Hambho kassa pana imaṃ maggaṃ sodhethā’ti te āhaṃsu
anya-e1202n:30_4: bhante sumedha tumhe kiṃ naṃ jānātha,
anya-e1202n:30_5: dīpaṅkaro nāma satthā paramābhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattavara dhammacakko janapada cārikaṃ caramāno anukkamena
anya-e1202n:30_6: amhākaṃ nagaraṃ patvā sudassana mahāvihāre paṭivasati.
anya-e1202n:30_7: Mayaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ nimantayimha tassa bhagavato āgamanamaggaṃ sodhemāti.
anya-e1202n:30_10: pageva buddhuppādo tena hi mayāpi imehi manussehi saddhiṃ dasabalassa āgamanamaggaṃ sodhetuṃ vaṭṭatīti so te manusse āha,
anya-e1202n:30_11: sace bho tumhe imaṃ magga buddhassa sodhetha -
anya-e1202n:30_12: sayahampi ekaṃ okāsaṃ sampaṭicchatvā ayaṃ sumedhapaṇḍito mahiddhiko mahānubhāvoti jānantā dubbisodhanaṃ
anya-e1202n:30_13: udakasambhinnaṃ ativisamaṃ ekaṃ okāsaṃ sallakkhetvā imaṃ hakāsaṃ tumhe sodhetha.
anya-e1202n:31_1: Ahampanimaṃ okāsaṃ iddhīyā paramadassanīya kātuṃ pahomi evaṃ kato pana maṃ na paritoseti ajja pana mayā
anya-e1202n:31_2: kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatiti paṃsuṃ āharitvā taṃ pahesaṃ pūreni,
anya-e1202n:31_3: tassa pana tasmiṃ padese asodhite jayasumana kusuma sadisi vaṇṇaṃ dupaṭṭacīvaraṃ timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetvā
anya-e1202n:31_4: nivāsetvā tassupari yuṇṇamāpaṅgena kusumakalāpaṃ parakkhipanto viya vijjullatā sassīrīkaṃ kāyabaṇdhanaṃ
anya-e1202n:31_5: baṇdhitvā kanaka girisikhara matthake lākhārasaṃ parisiñcante viya suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ pavāḷajālena parikkhipanto
anya-e1202n:31_6: viya suvaṇṇaṅghakaṃ rattakambalena paṭimuñcanto viya sarada samaya rajanikaraṃ rattavalāhakena paṭicchādento
anya-e1202n:31_7: viya ca lākhārasena tinna kiṃ sukaksumavaṇṇaṃ rattavara pasukūla cīvaraṃ pāripitvā gaṇdhakūgidva rato
anya-e1202n:31_8: kanakaguhāto sīho viya nikkhamitvā jaḷabhiññānaṃyeva catūhi khīṇāsava satasahassehi parivuto amaragaṇa
anya-e1202n:31_9: parivuto dasasatanayano viya brahmagaṇaparivuto mahā brahmā viya ca aparimita samaya samupacitāya kusalabalajanitāya
anya-e1202n:31_10: anopamayā buddhalīlāya tārāgaṇaparivuto sarada samaya rajanikaro viya gaganatalaṃ alaṅgata paṭiyattaṃ
anya-e1202n:32_1: Sumedhatāpasopi tena alaṅkata paṭiyattena maggena āgacchantassa dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato dvattiṃsa varalakkhaṇa
anya-e1202n:32_2: patimaṇḍitaṃ asatiyā anubyañjanehi anubyañjitaṃ byāmappahāparikkhepa sassīrīkaṃ iṇdanīlamaṇisaṃkāsoākāse
anya-e1202n:32_3: nānappakārā vijjullatā viya chabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsiyo vissajjentaṃ rūpaggappattaṃ attabhāvaṃ oloketvā ajja
anya-e1202n:32_4: mayā dasabalassa jīvitapariccāgaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati mā bhagavā kalale akkami maṇimayaṃ lakasetuṃ akkamanto
anya-e1202n:32_5: viya saddhiṃ catūhi khīṇāsava satasahassehi mama piṭṭhiṃ akkamanto gacchatu taṃ me bhavissati dīgharattaṃ
anya-e1202n:32_6: hitāya sukhāyāti kese mocetvā ajinajaṭā vākacīrāni kalela pattharitvā tattheva kalalapiṭṭhe nipajji nipanno
anya-e1202n:32_7: ca sace ahaṃ iccheyyaṃ sabbakilese jhāpetvā saṅghanavako hutvā rammanagaraṃ paviseyyaṃ aññātakavesena
anya-e1202n:32_8: pana me kilese ṇdhapetvā nibbānapattiyā kiccaṃ natthi,
anya-e1202n:32_9: yaṃnūnāhaṃ dīpaṅkara dasabalo viya paramābhisambodhiṃ patvā dhammanāvaṃ āropetvā mahājanaṃ saṃsārasāgarā uttāretvā pacchā parinibbāyeyyaṃ.
anya-e1202n:32_10: Idaṃ me patirupanti cintetvā aṭṭhadhamme samodhānetvā buddhabhāvāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipajja.
anya-e1202n:33_0: Dīpaṅkaropi bhagavā āgattvā sumedhapaṇḍitassa sīsasāge ṭhatvā kalalapiṭṭhe nipannaṃ tāpasaṃ disvā ayaṃ tāpaso buddhatthāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipanto,
anya-e1202n:33_1: ijjhissati nu kho etassa patthanā udāhu noti upadhārento -
anya-e1202n:33_2: anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatīti ñatvā ṭhitakova parisa majjhe vyākāsi,
anya-e1202n:33_3: passatha no tumhe bhikkhave imaṃ uggatapaṃ tāpasaṃ kalalapiṭṭhe nipannanti.
anya-e1202n:33_5: ayaṃ yiddhatthāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipanno samijjhissati imassa patthatā kappasata sahassādhikānaṃ catuntaṃ
anya-e1202n:33_6: asaṅkheyyānaṃ matthake gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatīti sabbaṃ vyākāsi.
anya-e1202n:46_0: Kolito upatisso ca - aggā hessanti sāvakā;
anya-e1202n:48_0: Khemā uppalavaṇṇā ca - aggā hessanti sāvikā;
anya-e1202n:52_1: Tato dīpaṅkaro dasabalo bodhisattaṃ pasaṃsitvā aṭṭhahi puppha muṭṭhīhi pūjetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
anya-e1202n:52_2: Tepi catūsata sahassa khīṇāsavā bodhisattaṃ pupphehi ca gaṇdhehi ca pūjetvā padapphaṇaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:52_3: Devamanussā ca tatheva pūjetvā vaṇditvā atha kho bodhisatto dasabalassa vyākaraṇaṃ sutvā buddhabhāvaṃ
anya-e1202n:52_4: karatalagatamiva maññamāno pamudita hadayo sabbesu paṭikkantesu sayanā vuṭṭhāya puppharāsi matthake pallaṅkaṃ
anya-e1202n:52_5: ābhujitvā nisinno buddhakārakadhamme upadhārento kahananu kho buddhakāraka dhammā,
anya-e1202n:52_6: kiṃ uddhaṃ adho disāsu vīdīyāsūti anukkamena sakalaṃ dhammadhātuṃ vicinanto porāṇakabodhisattehi āsevita
anya-e1202n:52_7: nisevita paṭhamaṃ dānapāramiṃ disvā tattha daḷabhisamādāna katvā evaṃ anukkamena sīla -
anya-e1202n:52_10: upekkhā pāramiyoca disvā tatthadaḷha samādānaṃ katvā devatāhi abhitthuto ākāsamababhugganatva hima himavantameva agamāsi.
anya-e1202n:53_0: Dīpaṅkaropi satthā catūhi khīṇāsava satasahassehi parivuto rammanagaravāsīhi pūjīyamāno devatāhi abhinaṇdiyamāno
anya-e1202n:53_1: alaṅkata paṭiyattena maggena rammanagaraṃ pavisitvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi.
anya-e1202n:53_3: Rammanagaravāsinopi upāsakā buddhapamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onīta
anya-e1202n:53_4: pattapāṇiṃ mālāgaṇdhādīhi pūjetvā dānānumodanaṃ sotukāmā nisīdiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:53_5: Bhagavāpi tesaṃ anumodanaṃ karonto dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggikathaṃ kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ
anya-e1202n:53_6: nekkhamme ānisaṃsañca pakāsetvā amata pariyosānaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
anya-e1202n:54_0: Evaṃ tassa mahajanassa dhammaṃ desetvā ekacce saraṇesu ekacce pañcasu sīlesu ekacce sotāpattiphale ekacce
anya-e1202n:54_1: sakadāgāmi phale ekacce anāgāmī phale ekacce catusupi phalesu ekacce tīsu vijjāsu ekacce chaḷabhiññāsu
anya-e1202n:54_2: ekacce aṭṭhasu samāpattisu patiṭṭhāpetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā rammanagarato nikkhamitvā sudassana mahāvihārameva pāvisi.
anya-e1202n:59_0: Kañci pañcasu sīlesu - sīle dasavidhe paraṃ;
anya-e1202n:61_0: Kassaci asathe dhamme - deti so paṭisambhidā;
anya-e1202n:70_0: Iti so dīpaṅkaro satthā vassasata sahassāni ṭhatvā sattānaṃ baṇdhanamokkhaṃ kurumāno sabbabuddhakiccāni
anya-e1202n:70_1: niṭṭhāpetvā naṇdārāme anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyinaheva dhātuyo tassa -
anya-e1202n:70_4: suvaṇṇapaṭimā viya sakalajambudīpavāsino manussā ghanakoṭiṭimasuvaṇṇaṭṭhikāhi evaṃ chattiṃsa yojanikaṃ mahāthūpamakaṃsu nivedasi - keci.
anya-e1202n:76_1: Dīpaṅkarassa pana bhagavato aparabhāgo ekaṃ asaṅkheyyaṃ atikkamitvā koṇḍañño nāma satthā udapādi.
anya-e1202n:76_2: Tadā bodhisatto vijitāvi nāma cakkavatti hutvā koṭisatasahassa saṅkhassa buddha pamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
anya-e1202n:76_3: mahādānaṃ adāyi satthā bodhisattaṃ buddho bhavissatīti vyākaritvā dhammaṃ desesi so satthu dhammaṃkathaṃ
anya-e1202n:76_4: sutvā rajji niyyādetvā pabbaji so tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañcaabhiññāyoca uppādetvā
anya-e1202n:76_6: Sopi buddho vassasatasahassāni ṭhatvā sabbabuddhakiccāni niṭṭhāpetvā caṇdārāme parinibbāyi tassāpi bhagavato
anya-e1202n:76_7: dhātuyā na vikiriṃsu sakalajambudīpavāsino manussā samāgantvā sattayojanikāsattaratanamayaṃ haritālamanosilāyamattikākiccaṃ
anya-e1202n:76_8: tela sappīhi udakakiccaṃ katvā cetiyaṃ niṭṭhāpesuṃ
anya-e1202n:79_0: Tassa aparabhāge ekaṃ asaṃṅkhayyaṃ atikkamitvā ekasmiṃyeva kappe cattāro buddhā uppajjiṃsu -
anya-e1202n:79_2: Maṅgalassa pana bhagavato kāle bodhisatto suruci nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā satthāraṃ nimantessāmīti upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e1202n:79_3: madhura dhammaṃkataṃ sutvā svātanāya nimantetvā koṭisatasahassa saṅkhassa buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa
anya-e1202n:79_4: sattāhaṃ gavapānaṃ nāma dānamadāsi satthā anumodanaṃ karonto mahāpurisaṃ āmantetvā tvaṃ kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ
anya-e1202n:79_5: dvannaṃ asaṅkheyyānaṃ matthake gotamo nāma buddho bhavissasīti vyākāsi mahāpuriso vyākaraṇaṃ sutvā ahaṃ
anya-e1202n:79_6: kira buddho bhavissāmi ko me gharāvāsena attho pabbajissamīti cintatvā tathārūpaṃ sampattiṃ keḷapiṇḍaṃ
anya-e1202n:79_7: vīya pahāya satthu santike pabbajitvā buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā
anya-e1202n:79_9: tasmimpi buddhe parinibbute dhātuyo na vikiriṃsu,
anya-e1202n:81_0: Tassa aparabhāge sumano nāma satthā udapādi tadā mahāsatto atulo nāma nāgarājā hutvā nibbatti-
anya-e1202n:81_1: mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo so buddho uppannoti sutvā ñātisaṅghaparivuto nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā koṭisatasahassa
anya-e1202n:81_2: bhikkhuparivārassa tassa bhagavato dibbaturiyehi upahāraṃ kāretvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā paccekaṃ dussayugāni
anya-e1202n:81_3: datvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāsi sopi naṃ satthā anāgate buddho bhavissasīti vyākāsi tasmimpi buddhe parinibbute
anya-e1202n:81_4: dhātuyo na vikiriṃsu jambudīpavāsano pubbe viya catuyojanikaṃ thūpamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:85_0: Tassa aparabhāge revato nāma satthā udapādi tadā bodhisatto atidevo nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā satthu dhammadesana
anya-e1202n:85_1: sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya sirasi añjaliṃ paggahetvā tassa satthuno kilesappahāne vaṇṇaṃ vatvā uttarāsaṅghena
anya-e1202n:85_3: Sopi naṃ satthā buddho bhavissatiti vyākāsi tasmiṃ pana buddhe parinibbute dhātuyo vikiriṃsu.
anya-e1202n:88_0: Dhātu vitthārikaṃ āsī - tesu tesu padesato”ti;
anya-e1202n:89_0: Tassa aparabhāge sobhito nāma satthā udapādi tadā bodhisatto ajito nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ
anya-e1202n:89_1: sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭāya buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānaṃ adāsi.
anya-e1202n:89_2: Sopi naṃ satthā buddho bhavissasīti vyākāsi tassāpi bhagavato dhātuyo vikiriṃsu.
anya-e1202n:93_0: Tassa aparabhāge ekamasaṅkheyyaṃ atikkamitvā ekasmiṃyeva kappe tayo buddhā nibbattiṃsu -
anya-e1202n:95_0: Yakkha senāpati ahosi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo aneka koṭisatasahassānaṃ yakkhānaṃ adhipati.
anya-e1202n:95_1: So buddho uppannoti sutvā āgantvā buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānamadāsi satthāpi taṃ anāgate buddho bhavissasīti vyākāsi.
anya-e1202n:95_2: Anomadassimhi pana bhagavati parinibbute dhātuyo na vikiriṃsu jambudīpavāsino pañcavīsayojanakaṃ thūpaṃ kariṃsu
anya-e1202n:99_0: Tassa aparabhāge padumo nāma satthā udapādi tathāgate agāmakāraññe viharentā bodhisatto sīho hutvā satthāraṃ
anya-e1202n:99_1: nirodhasamāpattiyā samāpannaṃ disvā pasannacitto vaṇditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pītisomanassajāto tikkhattuṃ
anya-e1202n:99_2: sīhanādaṃ naditvā sattāhaṃ buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ avijahitvā pītisukheneva gocarāya apakkamitvā jivitapariccāgaṃ
anya-e1202n:99_3: katvā payirupāsamāno aṭṭhāsi satthā sattāhaccayena nirodhā vuṭṭhito sīhaṃ oloketvā bhikkhusaṅghepi cittaṃ
anya-e1202n:99_4: pasādetvā saṅghaṃ vaṇdissatī“ti bhikkhusaṅgho āgacchatūti cintesi bhikkhu tāvadeva āgamiṃsu sīho saṅghe
anya-e1202n:99_6: Satthā tassa manaṃ oloketvā anāgate buddho bhavissatīti vyākāsi tassa pana bhagavato dhātuyo vikiriṃsu.
anya-e1202n:102_0: Dhātu vitthārikaṃ āsi - tesu tesu padesato”ti;
anya-e1202n:103_0: Tassa aparabhāge nārado nāma satthā ahosi tadā bodhisatto,
anya-e1202n:103_1: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pañcasu abhiññāsu aṭṭhasuca samāpattisuciṇṇavasī hutvā buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa
anya-e1202n:103_2: mahādānaṃ datvā lohita caṇdanena pūjamakāsi sopi naṃ anāgato buddho bhavissatīti vyākāsi nārada pana
anya-e1202n:103_4: Sabbe deva manussā sannipatitvā catuyojanikaṃ thūpaṃ kariṃsu.
anya-e1202n:107_0: Tassa aparabhāge ekamasaṅkheyyamatikkamitvā ito kappasatasahassa matthake ekasmiṃ kappe padumuttaro nāma satthā udapādi.
anya-e1202n:107_1: Tadā bodhisatto jaṭilo nāma mahāraṭṭhiko hutvā buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa civaradānamadāsi.
anya-e1202n:107_2: Sopi taṃ anāgato buddho bhavissatīti vyākāsi.
anya-e1202n:107_4: Sabbe devamanussā sannipatitvā dvādasa yojanikaṃ mahāthūpamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:111_0: Tassa aparabhāge tiṃsakappa sahassāni atikkamitvā sumedho sujāto cāti ekasmiṃ kappe dve buddhā nibbattiṃsu
anya-e1202n:111_1: sumedhassa pana bhagavato kāle bodhisatto uttaro nāma mānavo hutvā nidahitvā ṭhapitaṃyeva asītikoṭidhanaṃ
anya-e1202n:111_2: vissajjetvā buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya nikkhamitvā
anya-e1202n:111_3: pabbaji sopi naṃ anāgate buddho bhavissatīti vyākāsi.
anya-e1202n:115_0: Tassa aparabhāge sujāto nāma satthā udapādi.
anya-e1202n:115_1: Tadā bodhisattocakkavattirājā hutvā buddho uppannoti sutvā upasaṃkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā buddhapamukhassa
anya-e1202n:115_2: saṅghassa saddhiṃ sattahi ratanehi catumahādīpaṃ rajjaṃ datvā satthu santike pabbaji sakalaraṭṭhavāsino
anya-e1202n:115_3: raṭṭhuppādaṃ gahetvā ārāmika kiccaṃ sādhentā buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa niccaṃ mahādānamadaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:115_4: Sopi naṃ satthā anāgate buddhobhavissatīti vyākāsi sujātassa pana bhagavato dhātuyo ekaghanā ahesuṃ jambudīpavāsino tigāvutaṃ thūpamakaṃsu
anya-e1202n:119_0: Tassa aparabhāge aṭṭhārasa kappasatamatthake ekasmiṃ kappe piyadassi atthadassi dhammadassiti tayo buddhā
anya-e1202n:119_1: nibbattiṃsu piyadassi buddhakāle bodhisatto kassapo nāma māṇavo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragato hutvā satthu
anya-e1202n:119_2: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā koṭisatasahassa dhana pariccāgena saṅghārāmaṃ kāretvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāsi
anya-e1202n:119_3: atha naṃ satthā aṭṭhārasa kappa sataccayena buddho bhavissatīti vyākāsi piyadassissa bhagavatopi dhātuyo
anya-e1202n:119_4: ekaghanāva ahesuṃ jambudīpavāsino sannipatitvā tiyojanikaṃ mahāthūpamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:123_0: Tassa aparabhāge atthadassi nāma bhagavā udapādi tadā bodhisatto mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo susimo nāma tāpaso
anya-e1202n:123_1: hutvā bhagavato santike dhammaṃ sutvā pasīditvā dibbāni maṇdārava padumapāricchattakādīni pupphāni āharitvā
anya-e1202n:123_2: cātudvīpika mahāmegho viya pupphavassaṃ vassetvā samantato pupphamaṇḍapa pupphaagaghiya toraṇādīni katvā
anya-e1202n:123_3: maṇdārava pupphacchattena dasabalaṃ pūjesi sopi naṃ bhagavā anāgato gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatīti vākāsi.
anya-e1202n:126_0: Dhātuvitthārikaṃ āsi - tesu tesu ca raṭṭhato”ti;
anya-e1202n:127_0: Tassa aparabhāge dhammadassi nāma satthā udapādi.
anya-e1202n:127_1: Tadā bodhisatto sakkā devarājā dibbagaṇdhapupphehi ca dibbaturiyehi ca pūjaṃ akāsi sopi naṃ buddho bhavissatīti vyākāsi.
anya-e1202n:127_2: Dhammadassissa pana bhagavato dhātuyo ekaghanā ahesuṃ.
anya-e1202n:131_0: Tassa aparabhāge catunavutikappa matthake ekasmiṃ kappe ekova siddhattho nāma satthā udapādi.
anya-e1202n:131_1: Tadā bodhisatto uggatejo abhiññābala sampanno maṅgalo nāma tāpaso hutvā mahājambuphalaṃ āharitvā tathāgassa
anya-e1202n:131_2: adāsi satthā taṃ phalaṃ paribhuñjitvā catunavuti kappamatthake buddho bhavissatīti vyākāsi tassāpi bhagavato
anya-e1202n:135_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito dvānavuti kappamatthake tisso phussoti ekasmiṃ kappe deva buddhā nibbattiṃsu tissassa
anya-e1202n:135_1: bhagavato kāle bodhisattā mahābhogo mahāyaso sujāto nāma khattiyo hutvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā mahiddhikabhāvaṃ
anya-e1202n:135_2: patvā buddho uppannoti sutvā dibbamaṇdārava paduma pāricchatta pupphāni ādāya catuparisamajjhe gacchantaṃ
anya-e1202n:135_4: Ākāse pupphavitānamiva aṭṭhāsi sopi naṃ satthā ito dvānavuti kappamatthake buddho bhavissatīti vyākāsi.
anya-e1202n:135_5: Tassāpi bhagavato dhātuyo na vikiriṃsu dhātuyo gahetvā tiyojanikaṃ thūpamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:139_0: Tassa aparabhāge phusso nāma buddho udapādi tadā bodhisatto vijitāvi nāma khattiyo hutvā mahārajjaṃ pahāya
anya-e1202n:139_1: satthu santike pabbajitvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā mahājanassa dhammakathaṃ kathetvā sīlapāramiñca pūresi.
anya-e1202n:139_2: Sopi naṃ buddho tatheva vyākāsi tassa pana bhagavato dhātuyo vikiriṃsu.
anya-e1202n:143_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito ekanavuti kappamatthake vipassi nāma buddho udapādi tadā bodhisatto mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo
anya-e1202n:143_1: atulo nāma nāgarājā hutvā sattaratana khacitaṃ sovaṇṇamahāpīṭhaṃ bhagavato adāsi sopi naṃ ito ekanavutikappamatthake
anya-e1202n:143_2: buddho bhavissatīti vyākāsi tassa pana bhagavato dhātuyo na vikiriṃsu sabbe devamanussā santipatitvā
anya-e1202n:147_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito ekatiṃsa kappamatthake sikhī vessabhūti dve buddhā nibbattiṃsu sikhissa bhagavato
anya-e1202n:147_1: kāle bodhisatto ariṇdamo nāma rājā hutvā buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa sacivaraṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā sattaratana
anya-e1202n:147_2: patimaṇḍitaṃ hatthiratanaṃ datvā hatthippamāṇaṃ katvā kappiya bhaṇḍamadāsi sopi naṃ ito ekatiṃsa kappe
anya-e1202n:147_4: sikhissa bhagavato dhātuyo ekaghanā hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu,
anya-e1202n:147_5: sakala jambudīpavāsino pana manussā dhātuyo gahetvā tiyojanubbedhaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ himagiri sadisa sobhaṃ thūpamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:150_0: Tassa aparabhāge vessabhū nāma satthā udapādi.
anya-e1202n:150_1: Tadā bodhisatto sudassano nāma rājā hutvā buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa sacīvaramahādānaṃ datvā tassa santike
anya-e1202n:150_2: pabbajitvā ācāraguṇasampanno buddharatane citatīkāra pīti bahulo ahosi sepi naṃ satthā ito ekatiṃsakappe
anya-e1202n:150_3: buddho bhavissatīti vyākāsi vessabhussa pana bhagavato dhātuyo vikiriṃsu.
anya-e1202n:154_0: Tassa aparabhāge imasmiṃ kappe cattāro buddhā nibbattiṃsu kakusaṇdho konāgamano kassapo amhākaṃ bhagavāti
anya-e1202n:154_1: katusaṇdhassa pana bhagavato kālo bodhisatto khemo nāma rājā hutvā buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa sapattacīvaraṃ
anya-e1202n:154_2: dānañceva añjanādi bhesajjāni ca datvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbaji sopi naṃ satthā vyākāsi tassa
anya-e1202n:154_3: pana bhagavato dhātuyo na vikiriṃsu sabbe sannipatitvā dhātuyo gahetvā gāvutubbedhaṃ thūpamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:158_0: Tassa aparabhāge konāgamano nāma satthā udapādi tadā bodhisatto pabbato nāma rajā hutvā amaccagaṇa parivuto
anya-e1202n:158_1: satthu santike gantvā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā buddhapamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā
anya-e1202n:158_2: pattuṇṇacīnapaṭṭa koseyya kambala dukulāni ceva suvaṇṇapaṭṭakañca datvā satthu santike pabbaji.
anya-e1202n:158_3: Sopi naṃ satthā vyākāsi tassa bhagavato dhātuyo vikiriṃsu
anya-e1202n:162_0: Tassa aparabhāge kassapo nāma satthā udapādi.
anya-e1202n:162_1: Tadā bodhisatto jotipālo nāma māṇavo hutvā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragubhūmiyañceva antalikkheva pākaṭo ghaṭīkārassa kumbhakārassa mitto ahosi.
anya-e1202n:162_2: So tena saddhiṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhamma
anya-e1202n:163_0: Kathaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā āraddhavīriyo tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā vattā vattasampattiyā buddhasāsanaṃ sobhesi.
anya-e1202n:163_2: Kassapassa pana satthuno dhātuyo na vikiriṃsu sakala jambudīpavāsino manussā sannipatitvā ekekaṃ suvaṇṇaṭṭhikaṃ
anya-e1202n:163_3: koṭi agghanakaṃ ratanavicittaṃ bahi racanatthaṃ ekekaṃ aḍḍhakoṭi agghanakaṃ abbhantara pūraṇatthaṃ manosilāya
anya-e1202n:163_4: mattikākiccaṃ telena udakakiccaṃ karontā yojanubbedhaṃ thupamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:171_0: Siddhatthabuddho tisso ca-vipassi ca sikhī tathā;
anya-e1202n:174_0: Yasmā tasmā mayā sādhū-te sabbepi pakāsitā,
anya-e1202n:175_0: Thūpā saddhā janā sādhū-te vaṇdeyyatha sādaraṃ;
anya-e1202n:177_0: Dhātu vitthārikā āsuṃ - tesu tesu padesatoti;
anya-e1202n:178_0: Sādhujana manopasādanatthāya kate thūpavaṃse vijjamānathūpānaṃ buddhānaṃ thūpakathā ceva sabbesaṃ santike abhinihārakatāce. Samattā.
anya-e1202n:179_0: Kassapassa pana bhagavato aparabhāge ṭhapetvā imaṃ sammā sambuddhaṃ añño buddho nāma natthi.
anya-e1202n:179_1: Evaṃ dīpaṅkarādīnaṃ catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṃ santike laddhavyākaraṇo bodhisatto pāramiyo pūretvā vessantarattabhāve ṭhito-
anya-e1202n:182_0: Evaṃ mahāpathavi kampanāni puññāni katvā āyupariyosāne tato cuto tusitabhavane nibbatti tattha aññe deve
anya-e1202n:182_1: dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhitvā yāvatāyukaṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavanto manussagaṇanāya sattahi divasehi āyukkhayaṃ
anya-e1202n:182_6: Devo devāsane nābhiramatīti imesu pañcasu pubbanimittesu uppannesu tāni disvāsuññāvata no saggā bhavissantiti
anya-e1202n:182_7: saṃvegajātāhi devatāhi mahāsattassa pāraminaṃ pūritabhāvaṃ ñatvā imasmiṃ idāni aññaṃ devalokaṃ anupagantvā
anya-e1202n:182_8: manussaloke uppajjitvā buddhabhāvaṃ patte puññāni katvā cuta cutā devalokaṃ pūressantīti cintetvā.
anya-e1202n:187_2: janettiyā āyuppamāṇanti imāni pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā katasanniṭṭhāno tato cuto sakyarājakule
anya-e1202n:187_3: paṭisaṇdhiṃgahetvā tattha mahāsampattiyā parihariyamāno anukkamena bhaddaṃ yobbanaṃ anupāpuṇitvā tiṇṇaṃ
anya-e1202n:187_4: utūnaṃ anucchavikesu tīsu pāsādesu devalokasiriṃ viya rajjasiriṃ anubhavamāno uyyānakīḷāya gamanasamaye
anya-e1202n:187_6: matasaṅkhāte tayo devadūte disvā saṃjāta saṃvegā nivattitvā catutthe vāre pabbajitaṃ disvā sādhu pabbajjāti
anya-e1202n:187_7: pabbajjāya ruciṃ uppādetvā uyyānaṃ gantvā tattha divasaṃ khepetvā maṅgala pokkharaṇitīre nisinno kappaka
anya-e1202n:187_8: vesaṃ gahetvā āgatena vissakamma devaputtena alaṅkata paṭiyatto rāhulakumārassa pātasāsanaṃ sutvā puttasinehassa
anya-e1202n:187_9: balavabhāvaṃ ñatvā yāva imaṃ baṇdhanaṃ na vaḍḍhati tāvadevanaṃ chiṇdissāmīti cintetvā sāyaṃ nagaraṃ pavisanto-
anya-e1202n:188_0: “Nibbutā nūna sā mātā - nibbuto nūna so pitā,
anya-e1202n:189_0: Nibbutā nūna sā nārī - yassāyaṃ īdiso pati”ti;
anya-e1202n:190_0: Kisāgotamiyā nāma pitucchā dhītāya bhāsitaṃ imaṃ gāthā sutvā ihaṃ imāya nibbutapadaṃ sāvitoti gīvato
anya-e1202n:190_1: satasahassagghanakaṃ muttāhāraṃ omuñcitvā tassā pesetvā attano bhavanaṃ pavisitvā sirīsayane nipanno
anya-e1202n:190_2: niddāvasa gatānaṃ nāṭakānaṃ vippakāraṃ disvā nibbinnahadayo channaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā kaṇthakaṃ āhārāpetvā taṃ
anya-e1202n:190_3: āruyha channasahāyo dasasahassa cakkavāḷa devatāhi kata parivāro mahābhinikkhamanā nikkhamitvā teneva
anya-e1202n:190_4: rattāvasesena tīṇi rajjāni atikkamma anomāya nadiyā paratīraṃ patvā assāpiṭṭhito oruyha muttarāsi sadise
anya-e1202n:190_5: cālikāpuliṇe ṭhatvā channatvaṃ mayhaṃ ābharaṇāni ceva kaṇthakañca ādāya gacchāhi ābharaṇāni ca kaṇthakañca
anya-e1202n:190_6: paṭicchāpetvā dakkhiṇa hatthena maṅgalakhaggamādāya vāmahatthena moliyā saddhiṃ cūḷaṃ chiṇditvā sace
anya-e1202n:190_7: ahaṃ buddho bhavissāmi ākāse tiṭṭhatu no ce bhūmiyaṃ patatūti ākāse khipi cuḷāmaṇī baṇdhanaṃ yojanappamāṇaṃ
anya-e1202n:190_8: ṭhānaṃgantvā ākāse aṭṭhāsi atha sakko devarājā yojanikena ratanacaṅgoṭakena paṭiggahesi.
anya-e1202n:196_0: Paṭiggahetvā ca pana devalokaṃ netvā suneru muddhani tiyojanappamāṇaṃ iṇdanīlamaṇimayaṃ cuḷāmaṇi cetiyaṃ
anya-e1202n:196_1: nāma akāsi atha kassapa buddhakāle porāṇa sahāyako ghaṭikāra mahābrahmā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ vināvāsabhāvappattena
anya-e1202n:196_3: Ajja me sahāyako mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhanto samaṇa parikkhāramassa gahetvā gacchāmīti-
anya-e1202n:197_0: “Ticīvarañca patto ca vāsi sūci ca baṇdhanaṃ,
anya-e1202n:199_0: Ime samaṇaparikkhāre āharitvā adāsi mahāpuriso arahaddhajaṃ nivāsetvā uttamaṃ pabbajjāvesaṃ gaṇhitvā
anya-e1202n:199_1: sāṭakayugalaṃ ākāse khipi taṃ brahmā paṭiggahetvā brahmaloke dvādasayojanikaṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ dussacetiyamakāsi.
anya-e1202n:203_0: Na kareyya mahussāhaṃva-ko hi nāma budho jano”ti;
anya-e1202n:205_1: Bodhisatto pabbajitvā anukkamena rājagahaṃ gantvā tattha piṇḍāya caritvā paṇḍava pabbatapabbhāre nisinno
anya-e1202n:205_2: magadharājena rajjena nimantiyamāno taṃ paṭikkhipitvā sabbaññutaṃ patvā tissavijitaṃ āgamanatthāyatenagahita
anya-e1202n:205_4: uddakañca upasaṅkamitvā tesaṃ santike adhigatavisesena aparituṭṭho chabbassāni mahāpadhānaṃ padahitvā
anya-e1202n:205_5: visākha puṇṇama divase senāninigame sujātāya dinnapāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā nerañjarāya nadiyā suvaṇṇapātiṃ
anya-e1202n:205_6: pavāhetvā nerañjarāya tīre mahāvanasaṇḍe nānāsamāpattīhi divābhāgaṃ vitināmetvā sāyaṇha samaye sotthiyena
anya-e1202n:205_7: dinnaṃ tiṇamuṭṭhiṃ gahetvā kāḷena nāgarājena abhitthutaguṇo bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha tiṇāni.
anya-e1202n:205_8: Sattharitvā na tāvīmaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhiṇdissāmi yāva me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccissatī”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā pācīna dāsābhimukho nisīditvā-
anya-e1202n:205_9: sūriye anatthamiteyeva mārabalaṃ vidhametvā paṭhamayāme pubbe nivāsañāṇaṃ majjhimayāme cutūpapātañāṇaṃ
anya-e1202n:205_10: patvā pacchimayāmāvasāne dasabala catuvesārajjādi sabbaguṇapatimaṇḍitaṃsabbaññutañāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā
anya-e1202n:205_11: satta sattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā aṭṭhame sattāhe ajapāla nigrodhamūle nisinno dhammagambhīratā
anya-e1202n:205_12: paccavekkhanena appossukkataṃ āpajjamāno dasadahassī mahābrahma parivārena sahampati mahābrahmunā āyācita
anya-e1202n:205_13: dhammadesano buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ olokento brahmuno ajjhesanaṃ ādāya kassa nu kho paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyanti
anya-e1202n:205_14: olokento āḷāruddakānaṃ kālakatabhāvaṃ ñatvā pañcavaggīyānaṃ bhikkhunaṃ bahūpakārataṃ anussaritvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
anya-e1202n:205_15: kāsipuraṃ gacchanto antarāmagge upakena saddhiṃ mantetvā āsāḷahipuṇṇama divase isipatane migadāye pañca
anya-e1202n:205_16: vaggiyānaṃ bhikkhunaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ patvā te ananucchavikena āvuso vādena samudācarante aññāpetvā dhammacakkaṃ
anya-e1202n:205_17: pavattento aññākoṇḍaññattherapamukhe aṭṭhārasa koṭiyo amatapānaṃ pāyesi.
anya-e1202n:206_0: Tato paṭṭhāya cattālīsa saṃvaccharāni ṭhatvā caturāsīti dhammakkhaṇdha sahassāni desetvā gaṇanapathamatīte
anya-e1202n:206_1: satte bhavakantārato santāretvā sabbabuddhakiccāni niṭṭhapetvā kusinārāyaṃ upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane
anya-e1202n:206_2: yamakasālāna mantare uttasīsakaṃ paññatte mañcake visākhapuṇṇama divase dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno
anya-e1202n:206_4: Tadā kira bhagavato pūjāya yamakasālā sabbapāliphullā mūlato paṭṭhāya yāva aggā ekacchannā ahesuṃ.
anya-e1202n:206_5: Na kevalañca yamakasālāyeva sabbepi rukkhasākhā sabbapāliphullāva ahesuṃ.
anya-e1202n:207_0: Na kevalañca tasmiṃyeva uyyāne sakalepi dasasahassa cakkavāḷe phalupaga rukkhā phalaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:207_5: Sabbo mahā samuddo pañcavaṇṇa padumasañchanno ahosi tiyojana sahassavitthato pana himavā ghanabaddhamorapiñchakalāpo
anya-e1202n:207_6: viya nirantaraṃ mālādāmagavakkhito viya suṭṭhu pīḷetvā ābaddhapupphavaṭaṃsako viya supūrita pupphacaṅgeṭakaṃ
anya-e1202n:208_0: Yamakasālā bhummadevatāni sañcālitakkhaviṇdhaṭapā tathāgatasarīrassa uparipupphāni vikiranti.
anya-e1202n:208_2: Tāni honti suvaṇṇa vaṇṇāni paṇṇacchattappamāṇāni mahātumbamattaṃ reṇu gaṇhanti na kevalañca maṇdārava pupphāneca,
anya-e1202n:208_3: aññānipi sabbāni pāricchattaka pupphādīni suvaṇṇavaṅgoṭakāni rajatacaṅgoṭakāni ca pūretvā pūretvā tidasa
anya-e1202n:208_4: purepi brahmalokepi ṭhitāhi devatāhi vividhāni antarā avippakiṇṇāneva hutvā āgantvā pattakiṃjakkha reṇu
anya-e1202n:208_5: cuṇṇehi tathāgatassa sarīrameva okīranti na kevalañca devatānaṃyeva nāga supaṇṇa manussānampi upakappana
anya-e1202n:208_6: caṇdana cuṇṇāni na kevalañca caṇdanacuṇṇāneva kāḷānusārī tagara lohitacaṇdanādi sabbagaṇdhajātacuṇṇāni,
anya-e1202n:208_8: sabbagaṇdhavāsa vikatiyo suvaṇṇa rajatādisamugge pūretvā cakkavāḷa mukhavaṭṭiādisu ṭhitāhi devatāhi paviddhā
anya-e1202n:208_9: antarā avippakiritvā tathāgatasseva sarīraṃ okiranti dibbānipi turiyāni antalikkhe vajjanti.
anya-e1202n:208_10: Na kevalañca tāniyeva sabbānipi tantibaddha cammapariyonaddha susirādi bhedāni dasasahassacakkavāḷe deva- nāgava- supaṇṇa-
anya-e1202n:208_11: manussānaṃ turiyāni ekacakkavāḷe sannipatitvā antalikkhe vajjanti.
anya-e1202n:209_0: Varacāraṇadevatā kira nāmekā dīghāyukā devatā mahāpuriso manussapathe nibbattitvā buddho bhavissatīti
anya-e1202n:209_1: sutva paṭisaṇdhidivase gaṇhitvā gamissāmāti mālā ganthituṃ ārabhiṃsu tā gaṇthamānāva mahāpurise mātukucchiyaṃ
anya-e1202n:209_2: nibbatte tumbhe kassa gaṇthathāti vuttā na tāva tiṭṭhāti kucchito nikkhamana divase gahetvā gamissāmāti
anya-e1202n:209_3: āhaṃsu puna nikkhentoti sutvā mahābhinikkhamanadivase gamissāmāti mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhantoti sutvā
anya-e1202n:209_5: Ajja abhisambuddhoti sutvā dhammacakkappavattanadivase gamissāmāti dhammacakkaṃ pavattayīti sutvā yamakapāṭihāriyadivase gamissāmāti.
anya-e1202n:209_6: Ajja yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karīti sutvā devo rohanadivase gamissāmāti.
anya-e1202n:209_7: Ajja devorohanaṃ karīti sutvā āyusaṅkhārossajjane gamissāmāti āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajīti sutvā na tāva niṭṭhāti parinibbānadivase gamissāmāti?
anya-e1202n:210_0: Ajja bhagavā yamakasālānamantare dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno sīhaseyyaṃ upagato balava paccusamaye
anya-e1202n:210_1: parinibbāyissati tumhe kassa gaṇthathāti vuttā pana kinnāmetaṃ ajjeva mātukucchiyaṃ paṭisaṇdhiṃ gaṇhi
anya-e1202n:210_9: Nanu nāma dutiya divase yāgupāna kālamattampi ṭhātabbaṃ assa,
anya-e1202n:210_10: dasa pāramiyo pūretvā buddhattaṃ pattassa nāma ananucchavikanti apari niṭṭhitāva mālāyo gahetvā āgamma
anya-e1202n:210_11: anto cakkavāḷe okāsaṃ ālabhamānā cakkavāḷa mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ labhitvā ādhāvantiyo hatthena hatthaṃ gīvāya
anya-e1202n:210_12: gīvaṃ gahetvā tīṇi ratanāni ārabbhadvattiṃsamahapurisalakkhaṇāni chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo dasapāramiyo addhacchaṭṭhāni
anya-e1202n:210_13: jātakasatāni cuddassa buddhañāṇāni ārabbha gāyitvā tassa tassa avasāne sahāya he sahāya heti vadanti.
anya-e1202n:211_0: Bhagavā pana evaṃ mahatiyā pūjāya vattamānayā paṭhamayāme mallānaṃ dhammaṃ desesi majjhimayāme subhaddassa
anya-e1202n:211_1: dhammaṃ desetvā taṃ maggaphale patiṭṭhāpesi pacchimayāme bhikkhu ovaditvā balava paccūsa samaye mahāpathaviṃ
anya-e1202n:211_2: kampento anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi parinibbute pana bhagavati lokanāthe ānaṇdatthero mallarājunaṃ
anya-e1202n:211_3: taṃ pavattiṃ āroceti te sutvāva gaṇdhamālaṃ sabbañca tālāvacaraṃ pañca ca dussayugasatāni ādāya gantvā
anya-e1202n:211_7: pūjentā celavitānāni karontā maṇḍala mālāni paṭiyādentā evaṃ tā divasaṃ vītināmesuṃ.
anya-e1202n:212_1: ativikālo kho ajja bhagavato sarīra jhāpetuṃ,
anya-e1202n:212_2: svedāni bhagavato sarīraṃ jhapessāmāti tathā dutiyampi divasaṃ vītināmesuṃ.
anya-e1202n:212_3: Tathā tatiyaṃ catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ chaṭṭhampi divasaṃ vītināmesuṃ satta me divase devatā ca dosinārakā
anya-e1202n:212_4: mallā ca bhagavato sarīraṃ dibbehi mānusakehi ca nacchehi - gītehi -
anya-e1202n:212_6: gaṇdhehi sakkāronto garukarontā mānentā pūjentā nagaramajjhena nīharitvā yattha makuṭabaṇdhanaṃ nāma mallānaṃ cetiyaṃ tattha nikkhipiṃsu
anya-e1202n:213_0: Tena kho pana samayena kusinārā yāva saṇdhisamala saṃkaṭīrājannumattena odhinā maṇdārava pupphena satthatā
anya-e1202n:213_1: hoti atha kho kosinārakā mallā bhagavato sarīraṃ cakkavattissa sarīraṃ viya ahatena vatthena veṭhesuṃ
anya-e1202n:213_2: ahatena vatthena veṭhetvā vihatena kappāsena veṭhesuṃ vihatena kappāsena veṭhetvā ahatena vatthena veṭhesuṃ.
anya-e1202n:213_3: Eteneva nayena pañcahiyugasatehi veṭhetvā āyasāya teladoṇiyā pakkhipitvā aññissā āyasāya doṇiyā paṭikujjetvā
anya-e1202n:213_4: sabbagaṇdhānaṃ citakaṃ karitvā bhagavato sarīraṃ citakaṃ āropesuṃ.
anya-e1202n:213_5: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahā kassapo pāvāya kusināraṃ addhānamagga paṭipanno hoti mahatābhikkhusaṅghena
anya-e1202n:213_6: saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi tena kho pana samayena there cittaṃ pasādetvā sagge nibbattā devatā
anya-e1202n:213_7: tasmiṃ samāgame theraṃ adisvā kuhinnu kho amhākaṃ kulupaga theroti āvajjento antarāmaggapaṭipannaṃ disvā
anya-e1202n:213_8: amhākaṃ kulupaga there avaṇdite citako mā pajjalitthāti adhiṭṭhihiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:214_0: Atha kho cattāro mallapāmokkhā sīsaṃ nahātā ahatāni vatthāni nicatthā vī saṃratanasatikaṃ caṇdanacitakaṃ
anya-e1202n:214_1: ālimpessāmāti aṭṭhapi solasapi dvattiṃsāpi janā hutvā yamaka ukkayo gahetvā tālavaṇeṭahi vijantā bhastāni
anya-e1202n:214_3: Atha kho kosinārakā mallā citakassa apajjalana kāraṇaṃ āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ pucchitvaṃ devatānaṃ abhippāyaṃ
anya-e1202n:214_4: sutvā mahākassapo kira bho pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ dasabalassa pāde vaṇdissāmīti āgacchati tasmiṃ
anya-e1202n:214_5: kira anāgate citako na pajjalati kīdiso bhoso bhikkhu kālo odāto dīgho rasso evarūpe nāma bho bhikkhumhi
anya-e1202n:214_6: ṭhito kiṃ dasabalassa parinibbānaṃ nāmāti deci gaṇdhamālādi hatthā paṭipathaṃ gacchiṃsu keci vīthiyo
anya-e1202n:214_8: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo yena kusinārā makūṭabaṇdhanaṃ nāma mallānaṃ cetiyaṃ,
anya-e1202n:214_10: Upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā tikkhattuṃ citakaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā āvajjentova sallakkhesi-
anya-e1202n:214_11: imasmiṃ ṭhāne pādāti tate pādasamīpe ṭhatvā abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya arasahassa
anya-e1202n:214_12: patimaṇḍitā dasabalassa pādā saddhiṃ kappāsa paṭalehi pañcadussayugasatāni suvaṇṇadoṇiṃ vaṇdanacitakañca
anya-e1202n:214_13: dvedhā katvā mayhaṃ uttamaṅge sirasi patiṭṭhahantūti adhiṭṭhāsi saha adhiṭṭhāna cittena tāni dussayugādini
anya-e1202n:214_14: dvedhā katvā valāhakantarā puṇṇacaṇdo viya pādā nikkhamiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:215_0: Thero vikasita rattapaduma sadise hatthe pasāretvā suvaṇṇavaṇṇe satthu pāde yāva gopphakā bāḷhaṃ gahetva
anya-e1202n:215_1: attano siravare patiṭṭhāpesi mahājano taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā ekappahāre neva mahānādaṃ nadi.
anya-e1202n:215_3: Eva pana therena ca mahājanena ca tehi ca pañcahi bhikkhusatehi vaṇdita mattetherassa hatthato muñcitvā
anya-e1202n:215_4: alattaka vaṇṇāni bhagavato pādatālāni dāruādisu kiñci acāletvāva yathāṭṭhāne patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:215_5: Bhagavato pādesu nikkhamantesu vā pavisantesu vā kappāsaaṃsu vā dasātantu vā telabiṇdu vā dārukhaṇḍaṃ vā ṭhānā calitaṃ nāma nāhosi.
anya-e1202n:215_7: Uṭṭhahitvā pana atthaṅgate caṇde viya sūriye viya ca tathāgatassa pādesu antarahitesu mahājano mahākaṇditaṃ kaṇdi.
anya-e1202n:215_8: Parinibbutakālato adhikataraṃ kāruññaṃ ahosi atha kho devātānubhāvena panesa citake samantato ekappahāreneva pajjali.
anya-e1202n:215_9: Jhāyamānassa bhagavato sarīrassa chavi camma maṃsādīnaṃ neva chārikāmattampi antamaso paññāyittha na masi,
anya-e1202n:215_10: sumana makula sadisā pana dhotamutta sadisā suvaṇṇasadisā ca dhātuyo avasissiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:216_0: Dīghāyuka buddhānañhi sarīraṃ suvaṇṇakkhaṇdhasadisaṃ ekaghanameva hoti.
anya-e1202n:216_1: Bhagavā pana ahaṃna ciraṃ ṭhatvā ṭhatvā parinibbāyāmi.
anya-e1202n:216_2: Mayhaṃ sāsanaṃ na tāva sabbattha vitthāritaṃ,
anya-e1202n:216_3: tasmā parinibbutassapi me sāsasamattampi dhātuṃ gahetvā attano attano vasanaṭṭhāne cetiyaṃ katvā paricaranto
anya-e1202n:216_4: mahājano saggaparāyano hotiti dhātūnaṃ vikiraṇaṃ adhiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n:216_10: Tattha sabbakhuddakā dhātu sāsapa bījamattā ahosi mahādhātu majjhe bhinna taṇḍulamattā.
anya-e1202n:217_0: Daḍḍhe kho pana bhagavato sarīre ākāsato aggabāhumattāpi jaṅghamattāpi tālakkhaṇdhamattāpi udakadhārā
anya-e1202n:217_1: patitvā citakaṃ nibbāpesi na kevalaṃ ākāsatoyeva parivāretvā ṭhitasālarukkhānampi sākhattara viṭapantarehi
anya-e1202n:217_4: samantā pathaviṃ bhiṇditvā taṃṅgalasīsamattā udakavaṭṭi eḷika vaṭaṃsaka sadisā gantvā citakameva gaṇhi
anya-e1202n:217_5: mallarājāno ca suvaṇṇaghaṭe rajataghaṭe ca pūretvā ābhata nānāgaṇdhodakena suvaṇṇa rajatamayehi aṭṭhadantakehi
anya-e1202n:217_7: Tattha citake jhayamāne parivāretvā ṭhita sālarukkhānaṃ sākhantarehi viṭapantarehi pattantarehi ca jāle
anya-e1202n:217_8: uggacchante pattaṃ vā sākhā vā daḍḍhā nāma natthi kipillikāpi makkaṭakāpi pāṇakāpi jālānaṃ antare neva
anya-e1202n:218_0: Ākāsato patita udakadhārāsupi sālarukkhehi nikkhantौdakadhārāsupi pathaviṃ bhiṇditvā nikkhanta udakadhārāsupi
anya-e1202n:218_1: dhammatāva pamāṇaṃ evaṃ citakaṃ nibbāpetvā pana mallarājāno saṇthāgāre catujātigaṇdha paribhaṇḍaṃ kāretvā
anya-e1202n:218_2: lāja pañcamāni pupphāni vikiritvā upari celavitānaṃ baṇdhāpetvā suvaṇṇatārakāhi khacetvā tattha gaṇdhadāma
anya-e1202n:218_3: mālādāma ratanadāmāni olambetvā satthāgārato yāva makuṭa baṇdhana saṅkhātā sīsappasādhana maṅgalasālā
anya-e1202n:218_4: tāva ubhohi passehi sāṇikilañja parikkhepaṃ kāretvā upari celavitānaṃ baṇdhāpetvā suvaṇṇatārakāhi khacetvā
anya-e1202n:218_5: tatthāpi gaṇdhadāma mālādāma ratanadāmāni olambetvā maṇidaṇḍehi pañcavaṇṇadhaje ussapetvā samantā dhajapatākā
anya-e1202n:218_6: pirikkhipitvā sittasammaṭṭhāsu vīthisu kadaliyo puṇṇaghaṭe ca ṭhapetvā daṇḍadīpikā jāletvā alaṅkata hatthikkhaṇdhe
anya-e1202n:218_7: sahadhātūhi suvaṇṇadoṇiṃ ṭhapetvā mālāgaṇdhādīhi pūjetvā sādhukīḷaṃ kīḷantā antonagaraṃ pavesetvā saṇthāgāre
anya-e1202n:218_8: sarabhamaya pallaṅke ṭhapetvā upari setacchattaṃ dhārayitvā satti hatthehi purisehi parikkhipāpetvā hatthīhi
anya-e1202n:218_9: kumbhena kumbhaṃ paharantehi parikkhipāpetvā tato assehi gīvāya gīvaṃ paharantehi tato rathehi āṇikoṭiyā
anya-e1202n:218_10: āṇikoṭiṃ pahantehi tato yodhehi bāhūhi bāhuṃ paharantehi tesaṃ pariyante koṭiyā koṭiṃ paharamānehi dhanūhi
anya-e1202n:219_0: Iti samantā yojanappamāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ sannāhagacchitaṃ viya katvā ārakkhaṃ saṃvidahiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:219_2: Ito purimesu dvīsu sattāhesu te bhikkhusaṅghassa ṭhānanisajjokāsaṃ karontā khādanīya bhojanīyaṃ saṃvidahantā
anya-e1202n:219_3: sādhukīḷāya okāsaṃ na labhiṃsu tato tesaṃ ahosi -
anya-e1202n:219_5: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati yaṃ amhākaṃ pamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā kocīdeva āgantvā dhātuyo gaṇhayya-
anya-e1202n:219_6: tasmā ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā kīḷissāmāti tena te evamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:220_0: Atha kho assosi kho rājā māgadho ajātasattu bhagavā kira kusinārāyaṃ parinibbutoti kathaṃ assosi paṭhamamevassa amaccā sutvā cintayiṃsu?
anya-e1202n:220_2: na so sakkā puna āhariṃtu pothujjanika saddhāya pana amhākaṃ raññā sadiso natthi.
anya-e1202n:220_4: hadayamassa eḷissati rājā kho panambhehi anurakkhitabboti te tisso suvaṇṇadoṇiyo āharitvā catumadhurassa pūretvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā etadavocuṃ.
anya-e1202n:220_5: Dve amhehi supinako diṭṭho tassa paṭighātatthaṃ tumhehi dukūlapaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā yathā nāsāpuṭamattaṃ paññāyati
anya-e1202n:220_7: Rājā atthavarakānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā evaṃ hotu tātā’ti sampaṭicchitvā tathā akāsi.
anya-e1202n:221_0: Atheko amacco alaṅkāraṃ omuñcitvā kese parikiriya yāya disāya satthā parinibbuto tadabhimukho hutvā añjalimpaggayha rājānaṃ āha-
anya-e1202n:221_2: Amhākaṃ āyuvaddhakenā cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ puññakkhettaṃ abhisekapiṭṭhikā bhagavā satthā kusinārāyaṃ parinibbutoti
anya-e1202n:221_3: rājā sutvā visaññī jāto catumadhuradoṇi usumaṃ muñci rājānaṃ ukkhipitvā dutiyāya doṇiyā nipajjāpesuṃ
anya-e1202n:221_4: so saññaṃ labhitvā tāta kiṃ vadathāti pucchi.
anya-e1202n:221_6: puna visaññi jāto catumadhuradoṇiṃ usumaṃ muñci.
anya-e1202n:221_7: Atha naṃ tatopi ukkhipitvā tatiyāya doṇiyā nipajjāpesuṃ so puna saññaṃ paṭilabhitvā tāta kiṃ vadathāti pucchi satthā mahārāja parinibbutoti.
anya-e1202n:221_8: Rājā puna visaññī jāto ca madhuradoṇi usumaṃ muñci.
anya-e1202n:222_0: Atha naṃ tatopi ukkhipitvā nahāpetvā matthake ghaṭehi udakaṃ āsiñciṃsu rājā saññaṃ paṭilabhitvā āsanā
anya-e1202n:222_1: uṭṭhāya gaṇdhaparibhāvīte maṇivaṇṇakese suvaṇṇaphalaka vaṇṇāya piṭṭhiyaṃ pakiritvā pavāḷaṅguravaṇṇāhi
anya-e1202n:222_2: suvaṭṭitaṅgulīhi suvaṇṇabimbaka vaṇṇaṃ uraṃ saṃsibbanto viya gahetvā paridevamāno ummattakaveseneva antaravīthiṃ
anya-e1202n:222_3: otiṇṇo so alaṅkata nāṭaka parivuto nagarā nikkhamma jīvakambavanaṃ gantvā yasmiṃ ṭhāne nisinnena bhagavatā
anya-e1202n:222_4: dhammo desito taṃ oloketvā bhagavā sabbaññu nanu me imasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīditvā dhammaṃ desayittha tumhe
anya-e1202n:222_8: Idāni pana me paṭivacanampi na detha bhagavāti punappuna paridevitvā nanu bhagavā ahaṃ aññadā evarūpe
anya-e1202n:222_9: kāle tuṭṭhe mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivārā jambudīpatale cārikaṃ carathāti suṇāma idāni pana ahaṃ tumhākaṃ
anya-e1202n:222_10: ananurūpaṃ ayuttaṃ pavattiṃ suṇāmīti evamādīni ca vattā saṭṭhimattāhi gāthāhi bhagavato guṇaṃ anussaritvā
anya-e1202n:222_11: cintesi mama paridevite neva na sijjhati.
anya-e1202n:222_12: Dasabalassa dhātuyo āharāpessāmiti mallarājunaṃ dūtañca paṇṇañca pāhesi.
anya-e1202n:223_2: ahampi arahāmi bhagavato sarīrānaṃ thūpañca mahañca kāretunti pesetvā pana sace dassanti suṇdaraṃ,
anya-e1202n:223_3: no ce dassanti āharaṇupāyena āharissāmīti caturaṅginiṃ senaṃ sannayhitvā sayampi nikkhantoyeva yathā
anya-e1202n:223_4: ca ajātasattu evaṃ vesāliyaṃ licchavirājāno kapilavatthumhi sakyarājāno allakappake bulayo rāmagāmake
anya-e1202n:223_5: koḷiyā veṭhadīpake brāhmaṇo pāvāyañca mallā dūtaṃ pesetvā sayampi caturaṅginiyā senāya nikkhamiṃsuyeva
anya-e1202n:223_6: tattha pāceyyakā sabbehi āsannatarā kusinārāto tigāvutantare nagare vasanti.
anya-e1202n:223_8: Mahāparihārā panete rājāno parihārā kāreṃntāva pacchato jātā.
anya-e1202n:223_9: Te sabbepi sattanagaravāsino āgattvā amhākaṃ dhātuyo vā dentu yuddhaṃ vāti kusinārā nagaraṃ parivārayiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:224_2: na mayaṃ satthu sāsanaṃ pahiṇimha na gattvā ānayimha.
anya-e1202n:224_3: Satthā pasa sayameva āgantvā sāsanaṃ pesetvā amhe pakkosapesi tumhepi kho pana yaṃ tumhākaṃ gāmakkhette
anya-e1202n:224_4: ratanaṃ uppajjati na taṃ amhākaṃ detha sadevake loke buddharatanasamaṃ ratanaṃ nāma natthi, evarūpaṃ.
anya-e1202n:224_5: Uttamaṃ ratanaṃ labhitvā mayaṃ na dassamāti evaṃ te kalahaṃ vaḍḍhetvā na kho pana tumhehiyeva mātu thanato khiraṃ pītaṃ,
anya-e1202n:224_6: amhehipi pītaṃ tumheyeva purisā amhe na purisā hotu hotūti aññamaññaṃ ahaṃkāraṃ katvā sāsana paṭisāsanaṃ
anya-e1202n:224_7: pesentā aññamaññaṃ mānagajjitaṃ gajjiṃsu yuddhe pana sati kosinārakānaṃyeva jayo abhavissa,
anya-e1202n:224_8: kasmā dhātupāsanatthaṃ āgatā devatā tesaṃ pakkhāahesuṃ.
anya-e1202n:225_0: Tato doṇo brāhmaṇo imaṃ vivādaṃ sutvā ete rājāno bhagavate parinibbutaṭṭhāne vividaṃ karonti na kho panetaṃ
anya-e1202n:225_1: patirūpaṃ alaṃ iminā kalahena cūpasamessāmi na nti uṇṇatappadese ṭhatvā dvebhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ doṇagajjitaṃ
anya-e1202n:225_2: nāma avoca tattha paṭṭhamakabhāṇavāre tāva ekapadampi te na jāniṃsu dutiyaka bhāṇavāra pariyosāne’ācariyassa
anya-e1202n:225_4: ācariyassa viya bho saddo’ti sabbe nī ravā ahesuṃ sakalajambudīpatale kira kulaghare jāto yebhuyyena
anya-e1202n:225_5: tassa na antevāsiko nāma natthi atha so te attano vacanaṃ sutvā tuṇhībhūte viditvā puna etadavoca
anya-e1202n:234_0: Tatrāyamattho “amhākaṃ buddho ahu khantivādo“ti buddhabhūmiṃ appatvāpi pāramiyo pūrento khantivāda tāpasakāle
anya-e1202n:234_1: dhammapālakumāra kāle chaddantahatthikāle bhūridatta nāgarāja kāle campeyya nāgarāja kāle saṅkhapāla
anya-e1202n:234_2: nāgarāja kāle mahākapikāle aññesupi bahūsu jātakesu paresu kopaṃ akatvā khantimeva akāsi.
anya-e1202n:234_4: kimaṅga pana etarahi iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu tādilakkhaṇaṃ patto sabbathāpi amhākaṃ buddho khantivādo ahosi.
anya-e1202n:235_0: Tassa evaṃ vidhassa na hi sādhaya uttamapuggalassa sarīrabhaṅge siyā sampahāro,
anya-e1202n:235_2: “sarīrabhaṅgeti sarīra bhaṅganimittaṃ dhātukoṭṭhāsahetūti attho “siyā sampahāro“ti āyudha sampahāro na hi sādhu siyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e1202n:235_3: “Sabbeva bhonto sahitā“ti sabbeva bhavanto sahitā bhotha mā bhijjittha.
anya-e1202n:235_4: “Samaggāti“ kāyena vācāya ca ekasannipātā ekavacanā samaggā bhotha “sammodamānā“ti cittenāpi aññamaññaṃ
anya-e1202n:235_5: modamānā bhotha.’Karomaṭṭhabhāge“ti bhagavatā sarīrāni aṭṭhabhāge karoma.
anya-e1202n:235_7: na kevalaṃ tumheyeva bahujjano pasanno tesu ekopi laddhu ayutto nāma natthiti bahuṃ kāraṇaṃ vatvā saññāpesi.
anya-e1202n:236_1: tena hi brāhmaṇa tvaññeva bhagavato sarīrāni aṭṭhadhā samaṃ suvibhattaṃ vibhajāhīti.
anya-e1202n:236_2: Evaṃ bhoti kho doṇo brāhmaṇo tesaṃ rājūnaṃ paṭissutvā dhātuyo samaṃ suvibhattaṃ vibhaji.
anya-e1202n:237_0: Tatrāyamanukkamo doṇo kira tesaṃ paṭissutvā suvaṇṇadoṇiṃ vivarāpesi.
anya-e1202n:237_1: Rājāno āgantvā doṇiyaṃ yevatā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā dhātuyo disvā bhagavā sabbaññu pubbe mayaṃ tumhākaṃ dvattiṃsa
anya-e1202n:237_2: lakkhaṇa patimaṇḍitaṃ chabbaṇṇabuddharasmikhacitaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ addasāma idāni pana suvaṇṇavaṇṇā
anya-e1202n:237_5: Brāhmaṇo tasmiṃ samaye tesaṃ pamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā dakkhiṇadāṭhaṃ gahetvā veṭhantare ṭhapesi atha pacchā samaṃ suvibhattaṃ vibhaji.
anya-e1202n:237_6: Sabbāpi dhātuyo pākatika nāḷiyā soḷasa nāḷiyo ahosuṃ.
anya-e1202n:237_7: Ekeka nagaravāsino dve dve nāḷiyo labhiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:238_0: Brāhmaṇassa pana dhātuyo vibhajantasseva sakkodevānamiṇdo kena nu kho sadevakassa lokassa kaṅkhācchedanāya
anya-e1202n:238_1: catusaccakathāya paccayabhūtā bhagavato dakkhiṇadāṭhā gahitāti olokento brāhmaṇena gahitāti disvā brāhmaṇo
anya-e1202n:238_2: dāṭhāya anucchavikaṃ sakkāraṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissati gaṇhāmi nanti veṭhantarato gahetvā suvaṇṇa caṅgoṭake
anya-e1202n:238_3: ṭhapetvā devalokaṃ netvā cuḷāmaṇī cetiye patiṭṭhāpesi brāhmaṇopi dhātuyo vibhajitvā dāṭhaṃ apassanto
anya-e1202n:238_4: kena me ṭhā gahitāti pucchitumpi nāsakkhi.
anya-e1202n:238_6: kiṃ tvaṃ paṭhamaṃyeva attano dhātūhi atthibhāvaṃ na aññāsīti,
anya-e1202n:238_7: attani dosāropanaṃ sampassamāno mayhampi koṭṭhāsaṃ dethāti vattumpi nāsakkhi.
anya-e1202n:239_0: Tato ayaṃ suvaṇṇakumbhopi dhātugatikoyeva yena tathāgatassa dhātuyo minitā.
anya-e1202n:239_1: Imassāhaṃ thūpaṃ karissāmīti cintetvā imaṃ me bhonto kumbhaṃ dadantūti āha tato rājāno brāhmaṇassa kumbhamadaṃsu
anya-e1202n:239_2: pipphalivaniyāpi kho moriyā bhagavato parinibbutabhāvaṃ sutvā bhagavāpi khattiyo,
anya-e1202n:239_4: arahāma labhituṃ bhagavato sarīrānaṃ bhāganti dūtaṃ pesetvā yuddha sajjā nikkhamitvā āgatā tesaṃ rājāno evamāhaṃsu -
anya-e1202n:239_6: vibhattāni bhagavato sarīrāni ito aṅgāraṃ garathāti.
anya-e1202n:240_0: Atha kho rājā ajātasattu kusinārāya ca rājagahassa ca antare pañcavīsati yojanamaggaṃ aṭṭha usabhavitthataṃ
anya-e1202n:240_1: samatalaṃ kāretvā sādisaṃ mallarājāno makuṭabaṇdhanassa ca saṇthāgārassa ca antare pūjaṃ kāresuṃ tādisaṃ
anya-e1202n:240_2: pañcavīsatiyojanepi magge pūjā kāretvā lokassa anukkaṇṭhanatthaṃ sabbattha antarāpaṇe pasāretvā suvaṇṇadoṇiyaṃ
anya-e1202n:240_3: pakkhittadhātuyo sattipañjarena parikkhipāpetvā attano vijite pañcayojanasata parimaṇḍale manusse sannipātāpesi.
anya-e1202n:241_0: Te dhātuyo gahetvā kusinārāto dhātukīḷaṃ kīḷantā nikkhamitvā yattha yattha vaṇṇavantāni pupphāni passanti,
anya-e1202n:241_1: tattha tattha dhātuyo satti antare ṭhapetvā tesaṃ pupphānaṃ khīṇakāle gacchanti.
anya-e1202n:241_2: Rathassa dhuraṭṭhānaṃ pacchimaṭṭhāne sampatte satta divase sādhukīḷaṃ kīḷanti evaṃ dhātuyo gahetvā āgacchantānaṃ
anya-e1202n:241_3: sattavassāni sattamāsāni satta ca divasāni vitivattāni micchādiṭṭhikā samaṇassa gotamassa parinibbuta
anya-e1202n:241_5: sabbe no kammantā naṭṭhāti ujjhāyantā manaṃ padūsetvā chaḷāsītisahassamattā apāye nibbattā,
anya-e1202n:241_6: khīṇāsava āvajjitvā mahājano manaṃ padūsetvā apāye nibbattoti sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ disvā dhātu āharaṇupāyaṃ
anya-e1202n:241_7: karissāmāti tassa santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā dhātu āharaṇupāyaṃ kārohi mahārājāti āhaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:241_8: Sakko āha “puthujjano nāma ajātasattunā samo saddho natthi,
anya-e1202n:241_9: na so mama vacanaṃ karissati api ca kho māravibhisakasadisaṃ vibhīsakaṃ dassessāmi yakkha gāhaka khipanaka
anya-e1202n:241_13: Atha kho sakko taṃ sabbaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1202n:242_0: Therāpi rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mahārāja amanussā kupitaṃ,
anya-e1202n:242_1: dhātuyo āharāpehīti bhaṇiṃsu rājā na tāva bhante mayhaṃ cittaṃ tussati.
anya-e1202n:242_2: Evaṃ santepi āharatūti āha sattame divase dhātuyo āhariṃsu.
anya-e1202n:242_3: Evaṃ āhatadhātuyo gahetvā rājā rājagahe thupamakāsi itarepi rājāno attano attano balānurūpena nīharitvā sakasakaṭṭhāne thūpamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:242_4: Doṇipi brāhmaṇo piphphalīvaniyāpi moriyā sakasakaṭṭhāne thūpamakaṃsūti.
anya-e1202n:243_0: Eko thūpo rājagahe - eko vesāliyā pure,
anya-e1202n:245_0: Eko thūpo rāmagāme - eko ca veṭhadīpake,
anya-e1202n:246_0: Eko pāceyyake malle - eko ca kusinārake;
anya-e1202n:247_0: Ye te sārīrikā thūpā - jambuvadīpe patiṭṭhitā;
anya-e1202n:254_1: Evaṃ patiṭṭhitesu pana thūpesu mahākassapatthero dhātūnaṃ antarāyaṃ disvā ajātasattuṃ upasaṅkamitvā mahārāja
anya-e1202n:254_2: ekaṃ dhātunidhānaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatiti āha sādhu bhante nidhānakammaṃ tāva mama hotu,
anya-e1202n:254_4: Na mahārāja dhātu āharaṇaṃ tuyhaṃ bhāro,
anya-e1202n:254_8: Thero tesaṃ tesaṃ rājakulānaṃ paricaraṇamattakameva ṭhapetvā sesedhātuyo āhari.
anya-e1202n:255_0: Rāmagāme pana dhātuyo nāgā gaṇhiṃsu tāsaṃ antarāyo natthi,
anya-e1202n:255_1: anāgate laṅkādīpe mahāvihāre mahācetiyamhi nidhiyissa nīti.
anya-e1202n:255_3: sesehi sattahi nagarehi āharitvā rājagahassa pācīna dakkhina disābhāge ṭhapetvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne yo pāsāṇo atthi,
anya-e1202n:256_0: Rājā taṃ ṭhānaṃ khaṇāpetvā tato uddhaṭa paṃsunā iṭṭhikā kāretvā asīti mahāsāvakānaṃ thūpe kāreti idha
anya-e1202n:256_1: rājā kiṃ kārehīti pucchantānampi mahāsāvakānaṃcetiyā nīti vadanti na koci dhātunidhānabhāvaṃ jānāti asītihatthagambhīre
anya-e1202n:256_2: pana tasmiṃ padese jāte heṭṭhā lobhasattharaṃ sattharāpetvā tattha thūpārāme cetiya gharappamāṇaṃ tambalohamayaṃ
anya-e1202n:256_3: gehaṃ kārāpetvā aṭṭhaṭṭha hari caṇdanādimaye karaṇḍe ca thūpe ca kārāpesi.
anya-e1202n:257_0: Atha kho bhagavato dhātuyo haricaṇdana karaṇḍe pakkhipitvā taṃ haricaṇdanaṃ karaṇḍaṃ aññasmiṃ haricaṇdana
anya-e1202n:257_1: karaṇḍe tampi aññasminti evaṃ aṭṭha haricaṇdana karaṇḍe ekato katvā eteneva upāyena aṭṭha karaṇḍe aṭṭhasu
anya-e1202n:257_2: haricaṇdana thūpesu aṭṭha haricaṇdanathūpe aṭṭhasu lohitacaṇdana karaṇḍesu,
anya-e1202n:257_11: aṭṭha rajatakaraṇḍe aṭṭhasu rajatathūpese aṭṭha rajatathūpe aṭṭhasu maṇikaraṇḍesu aṭṭhamaṇikareṇḍaaṭṭhasuvaṇṇathūpesu,
anya-e1202n:257_16: aṭṭha phaḷika karaṇḍe aṭṭhasu phaḷikathūpesu pakkhipi sabba uparimaṃ phaḷikacetiyaṃ thūpārāma cetiyappamāṇaṃ ahosi.
anya-e1202n:258_0: Tassa uparisabbaratanamayaṃ gehaṃ kāresi tassa upari suvaṇṇamayaṃ,
anya-e1202n:258_2: tassa upari tambalohamayaṃ gehaṃ kāresi tattha sabbaratanamayaṃ vālukaṃ okiritvā jalaja thalaja pupphānaṃ
anya-e1202n:258_3: sahassāni vippakiritvā addhacchaṭṭhāni jātakasatāni āsīti mahāthere suddhodana mahārājānaṃ mahāmāyādeviṃ
anya-e1202n:258_4: satta sahajāte sabbānetāni suvaṇṇamayāneva kāresi pañcapañcasate suvaṇṇarajatamaye puṇṇaghaṭe ṭhapāpesi
anya-e1202n:258_5: pañcasuvaṇṇadhajasate pañcasate suvaṇṇadīpake ca kārāpetvā sugaṇdhatelassa pūretvā tesu dukūlavaṭṭiyo ṭhapesi.
anya-e1202n:259_2: dīpā mā vijjhāyantūti adhiṭṭhahitvā suvaṇṇapaṭṭaakkharāni chiṇdāpesi.
anya-e1202n:259_3: Anāgate piyadāso nāma kumāro chattaṃ ussāpetvā asoko nāma dhammarājā bhavissati so imaṃ dhātuyo vitthārikā
anya-e1202n:259_4: karissatīti rājā sabbapasādhanehi pūjetvā ādito paṭṭhāya dvāraṃ pidahanto nikkhami tambalohadvāraṃ pidahitvā
anya-e1202n:259_5: āviñjana rajjuyaṃ kuñcikamuddikaṃ baṇdhi tattheva mahantaṃ maṇikkhaṇdhaṃ ṭhapesi anāgate daḷiddarājāno
anya-e1202n:259_6: imaṃ maṇiṃ gahetvā dhātūnaṃ sakkāraṃ karontūti akkharāni chiṇdāpesī.
anya-e1202n:260_2: Ettha ārakkhaṃ ṭhapehi’ti pahiṇi so āgantvā vāḷasaṅghāṭayantaṃ yojesi.
anya-e1202n:260_3: Kaṭṭharūpakāni tasmiṃ dhātugabbhe phaḷikavaṇṇa khagge gahetvā vātasadisena vegena anupariyāyantaṃ yojetvā
anya-e1202n:260_4: ekāya eva āṇivā baṇdhitvā samantato giñjaka vasathākārena silāparikkhepaṃ katvā upari ekāya pidahitvā
anya-e1202n:260_5: paṃsuṃ pakkhipitvā bhūmiṃ samaṃ katvā tassupari pāsāṇathūpaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1202n:262_1: Evaṃ niṭṭhite dhātunidhāne yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā thero parinibbuto,
anya-e1202n:262_4: aparabhāge piyadāso kumāro chattaṃ ussāpetvā asoko nāma dhamma rājā hutvā tā dhātuyo gahetvā jambudīpe caturāsītiyā cetiya sahassesu patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1202n:262_5: Kathaṃ biṇdusārassa kira ekasataṃ puttā ahesuṃ te sabbe asoko attanā saddhiṃ ekamātikaṃ tissa kumāraṃ ṭhapetvā ghātesi.
anya-e1202n:262_6: Ghātento cattāri vassāni anabhisitto rajjaṃ kāretvā catunnaṃ vassānaṃ accayena tathāgatassa parinibbānato
anya-e1202n:262_7: dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ upari aṭṭhārasame vasse sakalajambudīpe ekarajjābhisekaṃ pāpuṇi.
anya-e1202n:263_0: Abhisekānubhāvena imā rājiddhiyo āgatā mahāpathaviyā heṭṭhā yojanappamāṇe āṇā pavatti,
anya-e1202n:263_2: anotattadahato aṭṭhahi kājehi soḷasa pānīyaghaṭe divase divase devatā āharanti.
anya-e1202n:263_3: Yato sāsane uppannasaddho hutvā aṭṭha ghaṭe bhikkhusaṅghassa adāsi dve ghaṭe saṭṭhimattānaṃ tipiṭaka
anya-e1202n:263_4: bhikkhunaṃ dveghaṭe aggamahesiyā asaṇdhimittāya cattāro ghaṭe attanā paribhuñji.
anya-e1202n:263_5: Devatā eva himavante nāgalatā dantakaṭṭha nāma atthi siniddhā mudukaṃ rasavantaṃ,
anya-e1202n:263_6: taṃ divase divase ābhiranti yena rañño ca aggamahesiyā ca soḷasannaṃ nāṭakasahassānaṃ saṭṭhimattānaṃ
anya-e1202n:264_0: Devasikamevassa devatā agadāmalakaṃ agadaharīṭakaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇañca gaṇdhasampannaṃ ambapakkaṃ āharanti
anya-e1202n:264_1: tathā chaddanta dahato pañcavaṇṇaṃ nivāsana pārupaṇaṃ,
anya-e1202n:264_2: pītakavaṇṇaṃ hatthapuñchanaka paṭṭaṃdibbañcajānakaṃ āharanti devasikameva panassa anulepagaṇdhaṃ pārupanatthāya
anya-e1202n:264_3: asuttamayikaṃ sumanapupphapaṭaṃ mahārahañca añjanaṃ nāgabhavanato nāgarājāno āharanti.
anya-e1202n:264_4: Chaddantadaheyeva uṭṭhitassa sālino nava cāha sahassāni divase divase suvā āharanti.
anya-e1202n:264_5: Mūsikā nitthusa kaṇe karonti ekopi khaṇḍataṇḍulo na hoti.
anya-e1202n:264_6: Rañño sabbaṭṭhānesu ayameva taṇḍulo paribhogaṃ gacchati.
anya-e1202n:264_9: Dīpikā cammāni cālenti karavīka sakuṇā āgattvā madhurassaraṃ vikujentā rañño balikammaṃ karonti.
anya-e1202n:265_0: Imāhi iddhīhi samannāgato rājāeka divasaṃ suvaṇṇa saṅkhalika baṇdhanaṃ pesetvā catunnaṃ buddhānaṃ adhigata
anya-e1202n:265_1: rūpadassanaṃ kappāyukaṃ mahākāḷa nāgarājānaṃ ānayitvā setacchattassa heṭṭhā mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā
anya-e1202n:265_2: aneka satavaṇṇehi jalaja thalaja pupphehi suvaṇṇapupphehi ca pūjaṃ katvā sabbālaṅkāra patimaṇḍitehi ca
anya-e1202n:265_3: soḷasahi nāṭaka sahassehi samantato parikkhipitvā anantañāṇassa tāva me saddhammavara cakkavattino sammāsambuddhassa
anya-e1202n:265_4: rūpaṃ imesaṃ akkhīnaṃ āpāthaṃ karohīti nibbattāsīti anubyañjana patimaṇḍitaṃ dvattiṃsa mahā purisa lakkhaṇa
anya-e1202n:265_5: sassirīkatāya vikasita kamalupphala puṇḍarīka patimaṇḍitamiva salilatalaṃ tārāgaṇaraṃsijāla visaravipphutasobhāsamujjalamivagaganatalaṃ nīla- pīta-
anya-e1202n:265_6: lohitādi bheda vicittavaṇṇaraṃsi vinaddha byāmappabhā parikkhepa vilāsitāya sañjhappabhānurāga iṇdadhanu
anya-e1202n:265_7: vijjullatā parikkhittamiva kanakagiri sikharaṃ nānāvirāga vimalaketumālā samujjalitacārumatthakasobhaṃ
anya-e1202n:265_10: yakkha gaṇānaṃ buddharūpaṃ passanto sattadivasaṃ akkhipūjaṃ nāma akāsi
anya-e1202n:266_0: Rājā kira abhisekaṃ pāpuṇitvā tīṇiyeva saṃvaccharāni bāhiraka pāsaṇḍaṃ parigaṇhi catutthe saṃvacchare
anya-e1202n:266_1: buddhasāsane pasīdinaṃ brāhmaṇa jātiya pāsaṇḍānañca paṇḍaraṅga paribbājakānañca saṭṭhisahassamattānaṃ
anya-e1202n:267_0: Asoko pitarā pavattitaṃ dānaṃ attano antepure tatheva dadamāno ekadivasaṃ sīhapañjare ṭhito upasama paribāhirena
anya-e1202n:267_1: ācārena bhuñjamāne asaṃyatiṇdriye avinita iriyāpathe disvā cintesi īdisaṃ dānaṃ upaparikkhitvā yuttaṭṭhāne
anya-e1202n:267_2: dātuṃ vaṭṭatiti evaṃ cintetvā amacce āha.
anya-e1202n:267_3: Gacchatha bhaṇe attano attano sādhusammate samaṇa brāhmaṇe antepuraṃ atiharatha,
anya-e1202n:267_4: dānaṃ dassāmāti amaccā sādhu devāti rañño paṭissutvā te te paṇḍaraṅga paribbājakājīvaka nigaṇṭhādayo ānetvā ime mahārāja amhākaṃ arahantoti āhaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:268_0: Atha rājā antepure uccāvacāni āsanāni paññāpetva āgacchantūti vatvā āgatāgate āha attano attano anurūpe
anya-e1202n:268_1: āsane nisīdathāti ekacce bhaddapīṭhake ekacce phalakapīṭhakese nisīdiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:268_2: Taṃ disvā rājā natthi etesaṃ antesāroti ñatvā tesaṃ anurūpaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ datvā uyyojesi.
anya-e1202n:269_0: Evaṃ gacchante kāle eka divasaṃ sīhapañjare ṭhito addasa nigrodha sāmaṇeraṃ rājaṅgaṇena gacchantaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ santiṇdriyaṃ iriyāpatha sampannaṃ.
anya-e1202n:269_2: biṇdusāra rañño jeṭṭhaputtassa sumanarāja kumārassa putto.
anya-e1202n:269_4: biṇdusāra rañño kira dubbalakāleyeva asoka kumāro attanā laddhaṃ ujjenirajjaṃ pahāya āgantvā sabbaṃ nagaraṃ
anya-e1202n:269_5: attano hatthagataṃ katvā sumana rājakumāraṃ aggahesi.
anya-e1202n:270_0: Taṃ divasameva sumanassa rājakumārassa sumanā nāma devī paripuṇṇagabbhā ahosi.
anya-e1202n:270_1: Sā aññātakavesena nikkhamitvā avidūre aññataraṃ caṇḍālagāmaṃ saṇdhāya gacchanti,
anya-e1202n:270_2: jeṭṭhaka caṇḍālassa gehato avidūre ekasmiṃ nigrodha rukkhe adhivatthāya devatāya ito sumaneti vahantiyā
anya-e1202n:270_3: saddaṃ sutvā tassā samīpaṃ gatā devatā attano ānubhāvena ekaṃ sālaṃ nimmiṇitvā ettha vasāhiti padāsi.
anya-e1202n:271_0: Sā tassa nigrodha devatāya pariggahitattā nigrodhotveva nāmaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1202n:271_1: Jeṭṭhaka caṇḍālo daṭṭhadivasatoppabhūti taṃ attano sāmidhītaraṃ viya maññamāno nibaddhaṃ vaṭṭaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
anya-e1202n:271_3: Nigrodhakumāropi sattavassiko jāto tadā mahāvaruṇatthero nāma eko arahā dārakassa hetusampadaṃ disvā
anya-e1202n:271_4: viharamāno sattavassikodāni dārako kālo naṃ pabbājetunti cintetvā rājadhītayā ārocāpetvā nigrodhakumāraṃ
anya-e1202n:271_7: So ekadivasaṃ pātova sarīraṃ paṭijaggitvā ācariyupajjhānaṃ vattaṃ katvā pattacīvaramādāya mātuupāsikāya
anya-e1202n:271_8: gehadvāraṃ gacchāmīti nikkhami mātu nivesanaṭṭhānañcassa dakkhiṇadvārena nagaraṃ pavisitvā nagaramajjhena
anya-e1202n:271_9: gantvā pācīnadvārena nikkhamitvā gantabbaṃ hoti tena ca samayena asoko dhammarājā pācīna disābhimukho
anya-e1202n:272_0: Taṃ khaṇaṃyeva sigrodho sāmaṇero rājaṅgaṇaṃ pāpuṇi santiṇdriyo santamānaso yugamattaṃ pekkhamāno.
anya-e1202n:272_2: Ekadivasaṃ sīhapañjare ṭhito addasa nigrodhasāmaṇeraṃ rājaṅgaṇena gacchantaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ santiṇdriyaṃ iriyāpatha sampannanti.
anya-e1202n:272_5: ayampana dārako avikkhittacitto ativiyassa alokita vilokitaṃ sammiñjana pasāraṇañca sobhati,
anya-e1202n:272_6: addhā etassa abbhantare lokuttaradhammo bhavissatīti rañño sahadassaneneva sāmaṇere cittaṃ pasīdi.
anya-e1202n:272_8: Pubbe kira puñña karaṇakāle esa rañño jeṭṭhabhātā vāṇijako ahosi.
anya-e1202n:273_0: Atha rājā sañjātapemo sabahumāno sāmaṇeraṃ pakkosathāti amacce pesesi aticirāyatīti puna dve tayo pesesi
anya-e1202n:273_1: turitaṃ āgacchatūti sāmaraṇero attano pakatiyā eva agamāsi rājā patirūpāsanaṃ ñatvā nisīdathāti āha.
anya-e1202n:273_2: Ito cito ca oloketvā natthidāni añño bhikkhuti samussita setacchattaṃ rājapaḷlaṅkaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pattagahaṇatthāya rañño ākāraṃ dassesi.
anya-e1202n:273_3: Rājā taṃ pallaṅkaṃ samīpaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā evaṃ cintesi.
anya-e1202n:273_4: Ajjevadāni ayaṃ sāmaṇero imassa gehassa sāmiko bhavissati.
anya-e1202n:273_5: Sāmaṇero rañño hatthe pattaṃ datvā pallaṅkaṃ abharuhitvā nisīdi.
anya-e1202n:274_0: Rājā attano atthāya sampāditaṃ sabbaṃ yāgu-
anya-e1202n:274_3: Bhattakiccāvasāne rājā āha satthārā tumhākaṃ dinnovādaṃ jānāthāti jānami mahārāja ekadesenāti. Tāta,
anya-e1202n:274_4: mayhampi naṃ kathehīti sādhu mahārājāti rañño anurūpaṃ dhammapade appamāda vaggaṃ anumodanatthāya abhāsi.
anya-e1202n:275_2: aññātaṃ tāta pariyosāpehīti āha anumodanāvasāne dvattiṃsa dhurabhattāni labhitvā puna divase dvattiṃsa
anya-e1202n:275_3: bhikkhu gahetvā rājantepuraṃ pavisitvā bhattakiccamakāsi rājā aññepi dvattiṃsa bhikkhu tumhehi saddhiṃyeva
anya-e1202n:275_4: bhikkhaṃ gaṇhantūti eteneva upāyena divase divase vaḍḍhāpente saṭṭhi sahassānaṃ brāhmaṇa paribbājakānaṃ
anya-e1202n:275_5: bhattaṃ upacchiṇditvā anto nivesane saṭṭhisahassānaṃ bhikkhunaṃ niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
anya-e1202n:275_7: nigrodhattheropi rājānaṃ saparisaṃ tīsu saraṇesu pañcasu ca sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā buddhasāsane pothujjanikena
anya-e1202n:276_0: Puna rāja asokārāmaṃ nāma mahāvihāraṃ kārapetvā saṭṭhisahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
anya-e1202n:276_1: Sakalajambudīpe caturāsītiyā nagarasahassesu caturāsīti vihārasahassāni kārāpesi.
anya-e1202n:276_2: Caturāsīti cetiyasahassa patimaṇḍitāni dhammeneva no adhammena,
anya-e1202n:276_3: ekadivasaṃ kira rājā asokārāme mahādānaṃ datvā saṭṭhisahassa saṅkhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe nisajja
anya-e1202n:276_4: saṅghaṃ catūhi pavcayehi pavāretvā imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi bhante bhagavato desita dhammo nāma kittako hotīti.
anya-e1202n:277_0: Rājā dhamme pasīditvā ekekaṃ dhammakkhaṇdhaṃ ekekena vihārena pūjessāmīti ekadivasameva channavuti koṭidhanaṃ vissajjetvā amacce āṇāpesi.
anya-e1202n:277_1: Etha bhaṇe ekekasmiṃ nagare ekamekaṃ vihāraṃ kārentā caturāsītiyā nagarasahassesu caturāsīti vihārasahassāni
anya-e1202n:277_2: kārāpethāti sayañca asokārāme asoka mahāvihāratthāya kammaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
anya-e1202n:278_0: Saṅgho iṇdaguttattheraṃ nāma mahiddhiyaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ navakammādhiṭṭhāyakaṃ adāsi.
anya-e1202n:278_1: Thero yaṃ yaṃ na niṭṭhāti taṃ taṃ attano ānubhāvena niṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1202n:278_3: Ekadivasameva sabbanagarehi paṇṇāni āgamiṃsu amaccā rañño ārocesuṃ.
anya-e1202n:278_4: Niṭṭhitāni deva caturāsīti vihārasahassānīti atha rājā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhante mayā caturāsīti
anya-e1202n:278_5: vihārasahassāni kāritāni dhātuyokuto labhissāmīti puca pucchi.
anya-e1202n:279_1: Na pana paññāyati asukāṭṭhāneti rājā rājagahe cetiyaṃ bhiṇdāpetvā dhātuṃ apassanto paṭipākatiyaṃ kāretvā bhikkhu-
anya-e1202n:279_3: upāsikāyoti catasso parisā gahetvā vesāliṃ gato.
anya-e1202n:279_6: rāmagāme nāgā cetiyaṃ bhiṇdituṃ na adaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:279_7: Cetiye nipatita kuddālo khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ hoti evaṃ tatrāpi alabhitvā allakappaṃ- pāvaṃ-
anya-e1202n:279_8: kusināranti sabbattha cetiyāti bhiṇditvā dhātuṃ alabhitvā paṭipākatikāni katvā rājagahaṃ gantvā catasso
anya-e1202n:279_9: parisā sannipātetvā atthi kenaci sutapubbaṃ asukaṭṭhāne nāma dhātu nidhānanti pucchi.
anya-e1202n:280_0: Tattheko visaṃvassa satiko thero asukaṭṭhāne dhātunidhānanti na jānāmi.
anya-e1202n:280_1: Mayhaṃ pana pitāmahatthero mayi sattavassikakāle mālācaṅgoṭakaṃ gāhāpetvā ehi sāmaṇera,
anya-e1202n:280_3: tattha gacchāmāti gantvā pūjetvā imaṃ ṭhānaṃ upadhāretuṃ vaṭṭati sāmaṇeroti āha.
anya-e1202n:281_0: Rājā etadeva ṭhānanti vatvā gacche harāpetvā pāsāṇathūpaṃ paṃsuñca apanetvā heṭṭhā sudhābhūmiṃ addasa.
anya-e1202n:281_1: Tato sudhañca iṭṭhakāyo ca harāpetvā anupubbena pariveṇā oruyha satta ratanavālikaṃ asīti hatthāni ca kaṭṭharūpāni samparivattantāni addasa.
anya-e1202n:281_2: So yakkha dāsake pakkosāpetvā balikammaṃ kāretvāpi neva antaṃ na koṭiṃ pannanto devatā namassamāno ahaṃ
anya-e1202n:281_3: imā dhātuyo gahetvā caturāsītiyā vihārasahassesu nidahitvā sakkāraṃ karomi mā devatā antarāyaṃ karentūti āha.
anya-e1202n:282_0: Sakko devarājā cārikaṃ caranto taṃ disvā vissakammaṃ āmantetvā āha. Tāta,
anya-e1202n:282_1: asoko dhammarājā dhātuyo nīharissāmīti pariveṇaṃ otiṇṇo,
anya-e1202n:282_2: gantvā kaṭṭharūpāni hārehīti so pañcacūḷagāma dārakavesenāgantvā rañño purato dhanukahattho ṭhatvā hāremi mahārājāti āha.
anya-e1202n:283_0: Atha rājā āciñjane baddha kuñcika muddikaṃ gaṇhi,
anya-e1202n:283_2: anāgate daḷiddarājāno imaṃ maṇiṃ gahetvā dhātūnaṃ sakkāraṃ karontūti pana akkharāni disvā kujjhitvā mādisaṃ
anya-e1202n:283_3: nāma rājānaṃ daḷiddarājāti cattu yuttanti punappuna ghaṭetvā dvāraṃ vicaritvā antogehaṃ paviṭṭho.
anya-e1202n:283_4: Aṭṭhārasa vassādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ upari āropitadīpā tatheva pajjalanti niluppala pupphāni taṃ khaṇaṃ āharitvā āropitāni viya,
anya-e1202n:283_6: gaṇdhā taṃ muhuttaṃ piṃsitvā ṭhapitā viya.
anya-e1202n:284_0: Rājā suvaṇṇapaṭṭaṃ gahetvā anāgate piyadāsonāma kumāro chattaṃ ussāpetvā asoko nāma dhammarājā bhavissati
anya-e1202n:284_1: so imā dhātuyo gahetvā vitthārikā karissatīti vācetvā diṭṭho’haṃ ayyona mahākassapattherenāti vatvā vāmahatthaṃ
anya-e1202n:285_0: So tasmiṃ ṭhāne paricaraṇaka dhātumattakameva ṭhapetvā sesadhātuyo sabbā gahetvā dhātugharaṃ pubbe pihitanayeneva
anya-e1202n:285_1: pidahitvā sabbaṃ yathā pakatiyāva kāretvā upari pāsāṇacetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā caturāsītiyā vihārasahassesudhātuyo
anya-e1202n:285_2: patiṭṭhāpesi evaṃ jambudīpatale asoko dhammarājā caturāsiti cetiya sahassāni kārāpesi.
anya-e1202n:286_0: Sabbe thūpā sabbalokekadīpā sabbesaṃ ye saggamokkhāvahā ca,
anya-e1202n:286_1: hitvā sabbaṃ kiccamaññaṃ janena vaṇdayyā te sabbathā sabbakālanti.
anya-e1202n:288_1: Evaṃ asoko dhammarājā caturāsīti vihārasahassamahaṃ katvā mahāthero vaṇditvā pucchi dāyādomhi bhante buddhasāsane’ti.
anya-e1202n:288_4: Bhante channavutikoṭidhanaṃ vissajjetvā caturāsīti vihārasahassāni sacetiyāni kārāpetvā ahaṃ na dāyādo,
anya-e1202n:288_7: yo pana attano puttañca dhītarañca pabbājeti,
anya-e1202n:289_0: Evaṃ vutte asoko rājā sāsane dāyādabhāvaṃ patthayamāno avidūre ṭhitaṃ mahiṇdakumāraṃ disvā sakkhissasitvaṃ tāta pabbajitunti āha.
anya-e1202n:289_1: Kumāro pakatiyā pabbajitukāmo rañño vacanaṃ sutvā ativiya pāmojjajāto pabbjāmi deva,
anya-e1202n:289_2: maṃ pabbājetvā sāsane dāyādo hothāti āha tena ca samayena rājadhītā saṅghamittāpi tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitā hoti taṃ disvā āha-
anya-e1202n:289_5: Rājā putta na manaṃ labhitvā pahaṭṭhacitto bhikkhusaṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhante ime dārake pabbājetvā
anya-e1202n:289_6: maṃ sāsane dāyādaṃ karothāti saṅgho rañño vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā kumāraṃ moggaliputta tissattherena upajjhāyena
anya-e1202n:289_8: Majjhantikattherena ācariyena upasampādesi upasampadāmālakeyeva sahapaṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
anya-e1202n:290_2: Atha mahiṇdatthero upasampanna kālatoppabhūti attano upajjhāyasseva santike dhammañca vinayañca pariyāpuṇanto
anya-e1202n:290_3: dvepi saṅgitiyo āruḷhaṃ tipiṭaka saṅgahītaṃ sāṭṭhakathaṃ theravādaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vassānaṃ abbhantare uggahetvā
anya-e1202n:290_4: attano upajjhāyassa antevāsikānaṃ sahassamattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāmokkhaṃ ahosi.
anya-e1202n:291_0: Tena kho pana samayena moggaliputtatissatthero kattha nu kho anāgate sāsanaṃ suppatiṭṭhitaṃ gaveyyāti
anya-e1202n:291_1: upaparikkhanto paccantimesu janapadesu suppatiṭṭhitaṃ bhavissatīti ñatvā tesaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhāraṃ
anya-e1202n:291_2: katvā te te bhikkhu tattha tattha pesesi.
anya-e1202n:292_0: Majjhantikattheraṃ kasmīra gaṇdhāra raṭṭhaṃpesesi tvaṃ etaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gantvā tattha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpehīti
anya-e1202n:292_8: Attano saddhivihārikaṃ mahiṇdattheraṃ iṭṭiyattherena uttiyattherena bhaddasālattherena sambalattherena
anya-e1202n:292_9: ca saddhiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ gantvā ettha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpethāti.
anya-e1202n:292_10: Sabbepi taṃ taṃ disābhāgaṃ gacchantā attapañcamā agamiṃsu sabbepi therā gatagataṭṭhāne manusse pasādetvā sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
anya-e1202n:293_0: Mahiṇdatthero pana tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ gantvā sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpehīti upajjhāyena bhikkhusaṅghena ca ajjhiṭṭho
anya-e1202n:293_1: kālo nu kho me tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ gantuṃ noti upadhārento muṭasīvarañño mahallakabhāvaṃ cintesi.
anya-e1202n:293_3: na sakkā imaṃ gaṇhitvā sāsanaṃ paggahetuṃ,
anya-e1202n:293_4: idāni panassa putto devānampiyatisso rajjaṃ kāressati.
anya-e1202n:293_5: Taṃ gaṇhitvā sakkā bhavissati sāsanaṃ paggahetuṃ,
anya-e1202n:293_6: haṇda yāva so samayo āgacchati tāva ñātake olokema,
anya-e1202n:293_7: puna’dāni imaṃ janapadaṃ āgaccheyyāma vā na vāti.
anya-e1202n:294_0: So evaṃ cintetvā upajjhāyañca bhikkhusaṅghañca vaṇditvā asokārāmato nikkhamma tehi iṭṭiyādīhi catūhi
anya-e1202n:294_1: therehi saṅghamittāya puttena sumanasāmaṇerena bhaṇḍukenaka ca upāsakena saddhiṃ rājagahanagara upavattake
anya-e1202n:294_2: dakkhiṇa girijanapade cārikaṃ caramāno ñātake olokento cha māse atikkāmesi athānupubbena mātunivesanaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e1202n:294_3: veṭisa nagaraṃ nāma sampatto sampattañca pana theraṃ disvā theramātā devī pāde sirasā vaṇditvā bhikkhaṃ
anya-e1202n:294_4: datvā theraṃ attanā kataṃ veṭisagiri vihāraṃ nāma āropesi.
anya-e1202n:295_0: Thero tasmiṃ vihāre nisanno cintesi amhākaṃ idha kattabba kiccaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e1202n:295_1: Samayo nu kho idāni laṅkādipaṃ gantunti.
anya-e1202n:295_3: anubhavatu tāva me pitarā pesitaṃ abhisekaṃ devānampiyatisso ratanattayaguṇañca suṇātu,
anya-e1202n:295_4: chaṇatthañca nagarato nikkhamitvā missakapabbataṃ abhirūhatu tadā taṃ tattha dakkhissāmāti.
anya-e1202n:296_0: Māsātikkame sakkodevānamiṇdo mahiṇdattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca.’ Kālakato bhante muṭasīvarājā,
anya-e1202n:296_2: Sammāsambuddhena ca tumhe vyākatā anāgate mahiṇdo nāma bhikkhu tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ pasādessatī’ti.
anya-e1202n:296_3: Tasmā tiha vo bhante kālo dīpavaraṃ gamanāya,
anya-e1202n:297_0: Thero tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvāattasattamo veṭisa pabbatavihārā vehāsaṃ uppatitva anurādhapurassa
anya-e1202n:297_1: puratthimāya disāya missakapabbate patiṭṭhahi yaṃ etarahi cetiyapabbatotipi sañjānanti tassamiṃ divase
anya-e1202n:297_2: tambapaṇṇidipe jeṭṭhamūla nakkhattaṃ nāma hoti rājā nakkhattaṃ ghosāpetvā chaṇaṃ karothāti amacce āṇāpetvā
anya-e1202n:297_3: cattālīsa purisa sahassaparivāro nagarambhā nikkhamitvā yena missakapabbato tena pāyāsi migavaṃ kīḷitukāmo
anya-e1202n:297_4: atha tasmiṃ pabbate adhivatthā devatā rañño there dassessāmīti rohita migarūpaṃ gahetvā avidūre tiṇapaṇṇāni
anya-e1202n:298_0: Rājā disvā ayuttaṃ dāni pamattaṃ vijjhitunti jīyaṃ poṭhesi.
anya-e1202n:298_1: Mago ambatthalamaggaṃ gahetvā palāyituṃ ārabhi rājāpi piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubaṇdhanto ambatthalameva āruhi.
anya-e1202n:299_0: Mahiṇdatthero rājānaṃ avidūre āgacchantaṃ’mamaṃyeva rājā passatu,
anya-e1202n:299_1: mā itare’ti adhiṭṭhahitvā’tissa! Tissa! Ito ehī’ti āha.
anya-e1202n:299_3: imasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe jāto maṃ tissoti nāmaṃ gahetvā ālapituṃ samattho nāma natthi.
anya-e1202n:299_4: Ayampana chinnabhinnapaṭadharo bhaṇḍukāsāva vasano maṃ nāmena ālapati,
anya-e1202n:299_5: ko nu kho ayaṃ bhavissati manusso vā amanusso vāti.
anya-e1202n:302_0: Tena samayena devānampiyatissa rājā ca asokadhammarājā ca adiṭṭha sahāyakā honti.
anya-e1202n:302_1: Devānampiyatissa raññe ca puññānubhāvena chātapabbatapāde ekasmiṃ veḷugumbe tisso veḷuyaṭṭhiyo nibbattiṃsu ekā latāyaṭṭhi nāma,
anya-e1202n:302_2: ekā pupphayaṭṭhi nāma ekā sakuṇayaṭṭhi nāma.
anya-e1202n:302_3: Tāsu latāyaṭṭhi sayaṃ rajatavaṇṇā hoti taṃ alaṅkaritvā uppannalatā kañcana vaṇṇā khāyati pupphayaṭṭhiyaṃ pana nīla- pīta- lohita- odāta-
anya-e1202n:302_4: kāḷavaṇṇāni pupphāni sucibhattavaṇṭa patta kiñjakkhā hutvā khāyanti sakuṇayaṭṭhiyaṃ haṃsakukkuṭa-
anya-e1202n:302_5: jīvaṃjīvakādayo sakuṇā nānāppakārāni ca catuppadāni sajīvāni viya khāyanti samuddatopissa muttā- maṇi-
anya-e1202n:303_1: bhayamuttā gajamuttā rathamuttā āmalakamuttā calayamuttā aṅgulīveṭhakamuttā kakudhaphalamuttā pākatikamuttāti
anya-e1202n:303_2: so tā ca yaṭṭhiyo tā ca muttāyo aññca bahuṃ ratanaṃ asokassa dhammarañño paṇṇākāratthāya pesesi.
anya-e1202n:303_3: Asokopi pasīditvā pañca rājakakudhabhaṇḍāniceva aññe ca abhisekatthāya bahūpaṇṇākāre pahiṇi.
anya-e1202n:308_0: Rājā avirasutaṃ sāsanapavattiṃ anussaramāno therassa taṃ “samaṇāmayaṃ mahārāja dhammarājassa sāvakā“ti
anya-e1202n:308_1: vacanaṃ sutvā ayyā nu kho āgatāti tāvadeva āvudhaṃ nikkhipitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathayamāno,
anya-e1202n:308_2: sammodanīyakathaṃ kurumāneyeva tasmiṃ tānipi cattālīsa purisasahassāni āgantvā taṃ parivāresuṃ.
anya-e1202n:309_0: Rājā disvā ime kadā āgatāti pucchi mayā saddhiṃyeva mahā rājāti.
anya-e1202n:309_1: Idāni pana jambudīpe añññopi evarūpā samaṇā santīti.
anya-e1202n:309_2: Mahārāja etarahi jambudīpo kāsāva pajjoto isivātaparivāto, tasmiṃ-
anya-e1202n:312_0: Atha rājā bhante sve rathaṃ pesessāmi.
anya-e1202n:312_1: Taṃ abhirūhitvā āgaccheyyāthāti vatvā pakkākami thero acirapakkantassa rañño sumaṇasāmaṇeraṃ āmantesi
anya-e1202n:312_2: ehi tvaṃ sumana dhammasavanakālaṃ ghosehīti sāmaṇero abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya
anya-e1202n:312_3: adhiṭṭhahitvā samāhitena cittena sakalatambapaṇṇidīpaṃ sācento dhammasavanakālaṃ ghosesi.
anya-e1202n:313_0: Sāmaṇerassa saddaṃ sutvā bhummā devatā saddamanussāvesu,
anya-e1202n:313_2: Tena saddena mahādevatā sannipāto ahosi thero mahantaṃ devatā santipātaṃ disvā samacittasuttantaṃ kathesi.
anya-e1202n:313_3: Kathā pariyosāne asaṅkheyyānaṃ devānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e1202n:313_4: Bahū nāga supaṇṇā ca saraṇesu patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:313_5: Atha tassā rattiyā accayena rājā therānaṃ rathaṃ pesesi.
anya-e1202n:313_8: pacchā mayaṃ āgacchissāmāti vatvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā anurādhapurassa pacchimadisāya paṭhamaka cetiyaṭṭhāne otariṃsu.
anya-e1202n:314_0: Rājāpi sārathiṃ pesetvā anto nivesane maṇḍapaṃ paṭiyādetvā cintesi’ nisīdissanti nu kho ayyā āsane na nisīdissantī“ti.
anya-e1202n:314_1: Tassevaṃ cintayantasseva sārathi nagaradvāraṃ patvā addasa there paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā kāyabaṇdhanaṃ baṇdhitvā cīvaraṃ pārupante,
anya-e1202n:314_2: disvā ativiya pasannamānaso hutvā āgantvā rañño ārocesi āgatā deva therāti.
anya-e1202n:315_0: Rājā rathaṃ āruḷhāti pucchi na ārūḷhā deva,
anya-e1202n:315_1: api ca pacchato nikkhamitvā paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā pācīnadvāre ṭhitāti.
anya-e1202n:315_2: Rājā rathaṃ na ārubhiṃsūtī sutvā tena hi bhaṇe bhummattharaṇa saṅkhepena āsanāni paññāpethāti vatvā paṭipathā
anya-e1202n:315_3: āgamāsi amaccā pathaviyaṃ taṭṭikaṃ paññāpetvā upari kojavakādīni vicittattharaṇāni paññāpesuṃ rājāpi
anya-e1202n:315_4: gantvā there vaṇditvā mahiṇdattherassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā mahatiyā pūjāya ca sakkārena ca there
anya-e1202n:315_5: paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā anulādevī pamukhā pañca itthisatāni therānaṃ abhivādanaṃ
anya-e1202n:315_7: Thero rañño saparijanassa dhammaratanavassaṃ vassento petavatthuṃ-
anya-e1202n:315_10: Taṃ sutvā tānipi pañca itthisatāni sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikariṃsu.
anya-e1202n:316_0: Tadā nāgarā therānaṃ guṇe sutvā there daṭṭhuṃ na labhāmāti upakkosanti atha rājā idha okāso natthīti
anya-e1202n:316_1: cintetvā,’gacchatha bhaṇe hatthisālaṃ paṭijaggitvā vālukaṃ okiritvā pañcavaṇṇāni pupphāni vikiritvā vitānaṃ
anya-e1202n:316_2: baṇdhitvā maṅgala hatthiṭṭhāne therānaṃ āsanāni paññāpethā’ti āha,
anya-e1202n:317_0: Thero tattha gantvā nisīditvā devadūtasuttantaṃ kathesi kathā pariyosāne pāṇasahassaṃ sotāpattiphale
anya-e1202n:317_1: patiṭṭhahi tathā hatthisālā sambādhāti dakkhiṇadvāre naṇdanuyyāne āsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ.
anya-e1202n:317_2: Thero tattha nisīditvā āsivisopama suttantaṃ kathesi.
anya-e1202n:317_3: Tampi sutvā pāṇasahassaṃ sotāpattiphalaṃ paṭilabhi evaṃ āgatadivasato dutiyadivase aḍḍhateyyānaṃ pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e1202n:318_0: Therassa naṇdanavane āgatāgatāhi kulitthīhi kulasuṇhāhi kulakumārīhi saddhi samodamānasseva sāyaṇhasamayo jāto,
anya-e1202n:318_1: thero kālaṃ sallakkhetvā gacchāmi’dāni missaka pabbatanti uṭṭhahi.
anya-e1202n:318_2: Amaccā mahāmeghavanuyyāne there vāsesuṃ rājāpi kho tassā rattiyā accayena therassa samīpaṃ gantvā sukhasayitabhāvaṃ
anya-e1202n:318_3: pucchitvā kappati bhante bhikkhusaṅghassa ārāmoti pucchi.
anya-e1202n:319_0: Rājā tuṭṭho suvaṇṇa bhiṃkāraṃ gahetvā therassa hatthe udakaṃ pātetvā mahāmeghavanuyyānaṃ adāsi thero
anya-e1202n:319_1: punadivasepi rājageheyeva bhuñjitvā naṇdanavane anamataggiyāni kathesi.
anya-e1202n:319_3: Eteneva upāyena satta divasāni kathesi aḍḍha nacamānaṃ pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e1202n:319_4: Sattame divase pana thero antopure rañño appamāda suttantaṃ kathayitvā cetiyagirimeva agamāsi.
anya-e1202n:320_0: Atha kho rājā thero āyācito sayamevāgato,
anya-e1202n:320_1: tasmā tassa anāpucchā gamanampi bhaveyyāti cintetvā rathaṃ abhirūhitvā,
anya-e1202n:320_2: cetiyagiriṃ agamāsi mahatā rājānubhāvena gantvā therānaṃ santikaṃ upasaṅkamanto ativiya kilantarūpo hutvā upasaṅkami.
anya-e1202n:320_3: Tato naṃ thero āha kasmā tvaṃ mahārāja evaṃ kilama māno āgatoti.
anya-e1202n:320_4: Tumhe mama gāḷhaṃ ovādaṃ datvā idāni gantukāmā nukhoti jānanatthaṃ bhanteti.
anya-e1202n:320_6: api ca vassupanāyika kālonamāyaṃ samaṇena nāma vassupanāyikaṃ ṭhānaṃ ñātuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
anya-e1202n:320_7: Rājāpi kho taṃkhaṇaṃyeva karaṇḍaka cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ parikkhipitvā aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyā leṇesu kammaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nagarameva agamāsi.
anya-e1202n:321_0: Tepi thero mahājanaṃ ovadamānā cetiyagirimhi vassaṃ vasiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:321_1: Athāyasmā mahāmahiṇdo vutthavasso pavāretvā kattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ uposathadivase rājānaṃ etadavoca ciradiṭṭho
anya-e1202n:321_2: no mahārāja sammāsambuddho abhivādana paccupaṭṭhāna añjali kamma sāmīci kamma karaṇaṭṭhānaṃ natthi,
anya-e1202n:321_3: tenamhaṃ ukkaṇṭhitāti tanu bhante tumhe avocuttha parinibbuto sammāsambuddhoti kiñcāpi mahārāja parinibbuto,
anya-e1202n:321_5: Aññā tambhante thūpaṃ patiṭṭhāpemi bhūmibhāgaṃ vicinathāti.
anya-e1202n:321_6: Api ca dhātuyo kuto lacchāmīti sumanena saddhiṃ mantehi mahārājāti rājā sumanaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi’kutodāni bhantedhātuyo lacchāmā’ti sumano āha-
anya-e1202n:321_8: vīthiyo sodhāpetvā dhaja patāka puṇṇaghaṭādīhi alaṅkārāpetvā saparijjano uposathaṃ samādiyitvā sabbatālāvacare
anya-e1202n:321_9: upaṭṭhapetvā maṅgalahatthiṃ sabbālaṅkārehi patimaṇḍitaṃ kāretvā upari vassa setacchattaṃ ussāpetvā sāyaṇhasamaye
anya-e1202n:321_10: mahānāgavanuyyānābhimukho yā hi addhā tasmiṃ ṭhāne dhātuyo lacchasiti,
anya-e1202n:322_1: gaccha tvaṃ sāmaṇera jambudīpe ayyakaṃ asokadhammarājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena evaṃ vadehi’sahāyo
anya-e1202n:322_2: te mahārāja devānampiya tisso buddhasāsane pasanno thūpaṃ patiṭṭhāpetukāmo tumhākaṃ kira hatthe bhagavato
anya-e1202n:322_4: tamme dethā’ti taṃ gahetvā sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tumhākaṃ kira mahārāja hatthe dve dhātuyo atthi dakkhiṇadāṭhā ca dakkhiṇakkhakañca,
anya-e1202n:322_7: evañca naṃ vadehi kasmā tvaṃ mahārāja amhe tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ pahiṇitvā pamajjitthāti.
anya-e1202n:323_0: Sādhu bhanteti kho sumano therassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā tāvadeva pattacīvaramādāya vehāsamabbhuggantvā
anya-e1202n:323_1: pāṭaliputtadvāre oruyha rañño santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi rājā tuṭṭho sāmaṇerassa hatthato pattaṃ
anya-e1202n:323_2: gahetvā bhojetvā bhagavato pattaṃ gaṇdhehi ubbaṭṭetvā varamuttasadisānaṃ dhātūnaṃ pūretvā adāsi.
anya-e1202n:324_0: So tuṃ gahetvā sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upasaṅkami sakko devārājā sāmaṇeraṃ disvā kiṃ bhante sumana āhiṇḍasīti āha.
anya-e1202n:324_1: Tvaṃ mahārāja amhe tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ pahiṇitvā kasmā pamajjasīti,
anya-e1202n:324_4: Tumhākaṃ kira hatthe dve dhātuyo atthi dakkhiṇadāṭhā ca dakkhiṇakkhakañca,
anya-e1202n:324_5: tato tumhe dakkhiṇadāṭhaṃ pūjetha dakkhiṇakkhakaṃ pana mayhaṃ dethāti.
