anya-e1202n:602_5: Sīlapatiṭṭhaṃ samādhidaṇḍakaṃ iṇdriyasalākaṃ balamālaṃ maggaphalapatta sañchannaṃ vimuttivarasetacchattaṃ
anya-e1202n:602_6: ussāpetvā ñāṇābhisekampatto dhammaratana cakkaṃ pavattetvā dasasahassa cakkavāḷesu buddharajjaṃ hatthagataṃ
anya-e1202n:602_7: katvā rajjaṃ kāresīti rājā tīṇicchatta dhārakassa satthuno tikkhattuṃ rajjaṃ dammīti tikkhattuṃ dhātuyo
anya-e1202n:603_0: Tato rājā devamanussesu dibbagaṇdhamālādīhi pūjentesu anekesu turiyaghosa saṅgitesu vattamānesu dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ
anya-e1202n:603_1: sīsenādāya ratanamaṇḍapato nikkhamitvā bhikkhusaṅgha parivuto mahācetiyaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pācīnadvārenāruyha
anya-e1202n:603_3: Tato mahācetiyaṃ parivāretvā channavuti koṭippamāṇa arahanto aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:604_0: Rājā sīsato dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ otāretvā mahārahe sayanapiṭṭhe ṭhapessāmīti cintesi tasmiṃ khaṇe dhātukaraṇḍako
anya-e1202n:604_1: rañño sīsato satta tālappamāṇe ṭhāne gantvā sayameva vicari dhātuyo ākāsamuggantvā dvattiṃsa mahā purisalakkhaṇa
anya-e1202n:604_2: asiti anubyañjanā byāmappabhā patimaṇḍitaṃ ketumālopa sobhitaṃ nila- pīta-
anya-e1202n:604_3: lohitādi bheda vicitra raṃsijālā samujjalaṃ buddhavesaṃ gahetvā gaṇḍambamūle yamaka pāṭihāriyaṃ sadisa yamaka pāṭihāriyaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:604_4: Taṃ dhātupāṭihāriyaṃ disvā pasīditvā arahattampattā devamanussā dvādasakoṭiyo ahesuṃ.
anya-e1202n:604_6: Evaṃ dhātuyo anekadhā pāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā buddhavesaṃ vissajjetvā karaṇḍakaṃ pavisitvā tena saddhiṃ otaritvā rañño sīse patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:605_0: Rājā amatena viya abhisitto saphalaṃ manussatta paṭilābhaṃ maññamāno ubhohi hatthehi dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ
anya-e1202n:605_1: gahetvā nāṭaka parivuto alaṅkata sayana samīpaṃ gantvā dhātucaṅgoṭakaṃ ratanapallaṅke ṭhapetvā gaṇdhavāsitodakena
anya-e1202n:605_2: hatthe dhovitvā vatujātiya gaṇdhena ubbaṭṭetvā ratanakaraṇḍakaṃ vicaritvā dhātuyo gahetvā evaṃ cintesi.
anya-e1202n:607_0: Janassa saraṇaṃ hutvā yadi ṭhassanti dhātuyo;
anya-e1202n:610_0: Evaṃ cintetvā pana varasayanapiṭṭhe dhātuyo ṭhapesi tasmiṃ khaṇe dhātuyo raññā cintita niyāmeneva mahārahe sayane buddhavesena sayiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:613_0: Saha dhātu patiṭṭhānā akampittha mahāmahī, pāṭihīrāni nekāni pavattiṃsu anekadhā.”
anya-e1202n:614_0: Tadahi udakapariyantaṃ katvā ayaṃ mahāpathavī saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi,
anya-e1202n:614_4: cha devalokā ekakolāhala mahosi rājā etaṃ acchariyaṃ disvā pasanno attano kañcana mālika setacchattena
anya-e1202n:614_5: dhātuyo pūjetvā tambapaṇṇidipe rajjaṃ sattāhaṃ datvā tiṃsa satasahassagghanakaṃ alaṅkāra bhaṇḍaṃ omuñcitvā pūjesi.
anya-e1202n:614_6: Tathā sabbāpi nāṭakitthiyo amaccā sesa mahājano devā ca sabbābharaṇāni pūjesuṃ tasmā-
anya-e1202n:615_0: Tiṭṭhantaṃ sugataṃ tilokamahitaṃ yo pūjaye sādaraṃ,
anya-e1202n:616_0: Yo vā sāsapa bījamattampi taṃ dhātuṃ naro pūjaye;
anya-e1202n:617_0: Tesaṃ puññaphalaṃ samānamīti taṃ cittappasāde same,
anya-e1202n:618_0: Ñatvā taṃ parinibbutepi sugate dhātuṃ budho pūjaye’ti;
anya-e1202n:619_1: sappi ādi bhesajjāni ca saṅghassa datvā sabbarattiṃ gaṇasajjhāyaṃ kāresi puna divase nagare bheriṃ carāpesi
anya-e1202n:619_2: mahājano imaṃ sattāhaṃ gaṇdhamālādīni ādiya gantvā dhātuyo vaṇdatūti iṇdaguttattheropi sakala tambapaṇṇi
anya-e1202n:619_4: taṃ khaṇaṃyeva āgantvā vaṇditvā yathāṭṭhānaṃ gacchantūti adhiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n:620_0: Te tatheva dhātuyo vaṇditvā gamiṃsu rājā sattāhaṃ saṅghassa mahādānaṃ pavattetvā sattāhassa accayena dhātugabbhe mayā kattabbakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitaṃ,
anya-e1202n:620_2: Saṅgho uttarasumana sāmaṇere āmantetvā tumhehi pubbe āhaṭa medavaṇṇa pāsāṇena dhātu gabbhaṃ pidahathāti āha.
anya-e1202n:621_0: Tato khīṇāsavā dhātugabbhe gaṇdhā mā susantu mālā mā milāyantu.
anya-e1202n:621_1: Dīpā mā nibbāyantu ratanāni mā vivaṇṇāni hontu pūjanīyabhaṇḍāni mā nassantu.
anya-e1202n:622_0: Evaṃ rājā dhātu nidhāpetvā puna nagare bheriṃ carāpesi mahā cetiye dhātuṃ nidhāpetvā dhātuṃ āharitvā nidhānaṃ karontūti.
anya-e1202n:622_1: Mahājano attano attano balānurūpena suvaṇṇa rajatādi karaṇḍe kārāpetvā tattha dhātuyo patiṭṭhāpetvā dhātunidhānassupari
anya-e1202n:623_0: Iti sādhujana manopasādanatthāya kate thūpavaṃse dhātunidhāna kathā niṭṭhitā.
anya-e1202n:624_1: Tato rājā taṃ sabbaṃ pidahetvā cetiyaṃ karonto udarena saddhiṃ caturassa koṭṭhakaṃ niṭṭhāpesi atha chattakamme
anya-e1202n:624_2: sudhākamme ca aniṭṭhiteyeva māraṇantika rogena gilāno hutvā dīghavāpito kaniṭṭhabhātaraṃ pakkosāpetvā
anya-e1202n:624_3: cetiye aniṭṭhitaṃ chattakammaṃ sudhākammañca sīghaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā maṃ tosehi tātāti āha.
anya-e1202n:624_4: So rañño dubbalabhāvaṃ ñatvā antare aniṭṭhitakammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkāti suddhavatthehi kañcukaṃ kāretvā
anya-e1202n:624_5: cetiye paṭimuñcāpetvā cittakārehi kañcuka matthake vedikā ca puṇṇaghaṭa pañcaṅguli pantiyo ca kārāpesi.
anya-e1202n:625_0: Naḷakārehi veḷumaya chattaṃ kāretvā kharapattamaye caṇdasūriyamaṇḍale muddhani vedikā kāretvā lākhākukuṭṭhakehi
anya-e1202n:625_1: taṃ vicittaṃ katvā thūpakammaṃ niṭṭhitanti rañño arocesi rājā tena hi maṃ mahācetiyaṃ dassehīti vatvā
anya-e1202n:625_2: sivikāya nipajjitvā cetiyā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā dakkhiṇadvāre bhūmisayanaṃ paññāpetvā tattha nipanno dakkhiṇena
anya-e1202n:625_3: passena sayitvā mahāthūpaṃ vāmapassena sayitvā lohapāsādaṃ olokento pasanna citto ahosi.
anya-e1202n:625_4: Tadā rañño sāsanassa bahūpakārabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā gilāna pucchanatthāya tato tato āgatā bhikkhu channavuti koṭiyo rājānaṃ parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e1202n:625_5: Tato saṅgho vagga vaggā hutvā gaṇasajjhāyaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1202n:626_0: Rājā tasmiṃ samāgame theraputtābhayattheraṃ adisvā evaṃ cintesi.
anya-e1202n:626_1: So mayi damiḷehi saddhiṃ aṭṭhavīsati mahāyuddhe kayiramāse apaccosakakitvā idāni maraṇayuddhe vattamāṇe mayhaṃ parājayaṃ disvā maññe nāgacchatīti.
anya-e1202n:626_2: Tadā thero kariṇda nadī sīse pajjalita pabbate vasanto rañño parivitakkaṃ ñatvā pañcasata khīṇāsava parivusetā ākāsenāgantvā rañño purato pāturahosi.
anya-e1202n:627_0: Rājā theraṃ disvā attano purato nisīdāpetvā evamāha bhante tumhehi saddhiṃ dasamahā yodhe gahetvā damiḷehi saddhi yujdhiṃ.
anya-e1202n:627_1: Idāni ekakova maccūnā saddhiṃ yujjhituṃ ārabhiṃ.
anya-e1202n:627_2: Maccu sattumpana parājetuṃ na sakkomīti. Tato-
anya-e1202n:630_1: Mahārāja sabboyeva loka sannivāse jātiyā anugato,
anya-e1202n:633_0: Evaṃ jarā ca maccu ca-adhivattanti pāṇino,
anya-e1202n:634_0: Khattiyo brāhmaṇe vesse sudde caṇḍāla pukkuse,
anya-e1202n:636_0: Na tattha hatthinaṃ bhūmi-na rathānaṃ na pattiyā,
anya-e1202n:637_0: Na cāpi mantayuddhena-sakkā jetuṃ dhanena vā”ti;
anya-e1202n:638_0: Tasmā idaṃ maraṇaṃ nāma mahāyasānaṃ mahāsammatādīnaṃ mahā puññānaṃ jotiyādīnaṃ mahāthāmānaṃ baladevādīnaṃ
anya-e1202n:638_1: iddhimantānaṃ mahāmoggallānādīnaṃ paññāvantānaṃ sāriputtādīnaṃ sayambhūñāṇena adhigata saccānaṃ,
anya-e1202n:638_2: paccekabuddhānaṃ sabbaguṇasamannāgatānaṃ sammāsambuddhānampi upari nirāsaṅkameva patati kimaṅgapanaññesu sattesu.
anya-e1202n:640_0: Mahāyasā rājavarā gatā te sabbe mahāsammata ādayopi,
anya-e1202n:641_0: Aniccabhāvaṃ baladeva ādi mahābalā ceva tathā gamiṃsu;
anya-e1202n:642_0: Ye puññavantāni gatā pasiddhiṃ mahaddhanaṃ jotiyameṇḍakādī,
anya-e1202n:643_0: Upāvisiṃ vaccumukhaṃ sabhogā sabbepi te rāhumukhaṃ sasīva;
anya-e1202n:644_0: Yo iddhimantesu tathāgatassa puttesuseṭṭho iti vissutopi,
anya-e1202n:645_0: Thero mahārājasaheva iddhibalena so maccumukhaṃ paviṭṭho;
anya-e1202n:646_0: Sabbesu sattesu jinaṃ ṭhapetvā nevatthi paññāya samopi yena,
anya-e1202n:647_0: So dhammasenāpati sāvakopi gato mahārāja aniccataṃ’ca;
anya-e1202n:648_0: Sayambhūñāṇassa balena santiṃ gatā mahārāja sayambhūnopi,
anya-e1202n:649_0: Sabbepi te ñāṇabalūpa pannā aniccataṃ neva atikkamiṃsu;
anya-e1202n:651_0: Nāsakkhi gantuṃ sugatopi rāja aññesu sattesu kathāva natthi;
anya-e1202n:652_0: Tasmā mahārāja bhavesu sattā sabbepi nāsuṃ maraṇā vimuttā,
anya-e1202n:653_0: Sabbampi saṅkhāragataṃ aniccaṃ dūkkhaṃ anattāti vicintayassu;
anya-e1202n:656_0: Idhāgamma bahuṃ puññaṃ akāsi ca anekadhā,
anya-e1202n:658_0: Mahā rāja kataṃ puññaṃ yāvajja divasā tayā,
anya-e1202n:660_0: Taṃ sutvā tuṭṭhamānaso rājā bhante tumhe maccuyuddhepi apassayāti vatvā laddhassāso puññapotthakaṃ vācetuṃ āṇāpesi lekhako puññapotthakaṃ evaṃ vācesi.
anya-e1202n:675_1: Taṃ sutvā rājā tussitvā ṭhapehi ṭhapehi bhaṇeti vatvā evamāha.
anya-e1202n:675_2: Maricavaṭṭi vihāramahasattāhe thūpāramhasattāhe ca cātuddisa ubhato saṅghassa mahārahaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattesiṃ.
anya-e1202n:675_3: Catuvīsati mahāvisākhapūjā kāresiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe mahābhikkhusaṅghassa tikkhattuṃ cīvaramadāsiṃ satta
anya-e1202n:675_4: satta dīnāni laṅkā rajjaṃ sāsanassa pañcakkhattuṃ adāsiṃ sappi sannitta suparisuddha vaṭṭiyā dvādasaṭhānesu,
anya-e1202n:675_5: sattaṃ dīpasahassaṃ jālesiṃ aṭṭhārassu ṭhānesu gilānānaṃ vejjehi bhesajjañca bhattañca niccaṃ dāpesi.
anya-e1202n:675_7: Tattakesuyeva ṭhānesu ghatapakkajālapūve bhattena saddhiṃ niccaṃ dāpesiṃ.
anya-e1202n:676_0: Māse māse aṭṭhasu uposathadivasesu laṅkādīpe sabbavihāresu dīpatelaṃ dāpesiṃ.
anya-e1202n:676_1: Āmisa dānato dhammadānaṃ mahantanti sutvā heṭṭhaṃ lohapāsāde dhammāsane nisīditvā maṅgala suttaṃ osāretuṃ
anya-e1202n:676_3: Tato paṭṭhāya dhammadesake sakkaritvā sabbavihāresu dhammakathaṃ kathāpesiṃ ekekassa dhammakathikassa
anya-e1202n:676_4: nāḷa nāḷippamāṇāni sappiphāṇita sakkharāni caturaṅgula muṭṭhippamāṇaṃ yaṭṭhimadhukaṃ sāṭakadvayañca māsassa
anya-e1202n:676_6: Etaṃ sabbampi issariye ṭhatvā dinnattā mama cittaṃ sa ārādheti.
anya-e1202n:676_7: Jīvitaṃ pana anapekkhitvā duggatena mayā dinnadānadvayameva ārādhetīti.
anya-e1202n:677_0: Taṃ sutvā abhayatthero mahārāja pasādanīyaṭṭhāneyeva pasādaṃ akāsi taṃ pana piṇḍapātadvayaṃ parissa pīḷaṃ
anya-e1202n:677_1: akatvā laddha dhammika paccayattā attānaṃ anavaloketvā asajjamānena dinnattā paṭiggāhakānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ
anya-e1202n:677_2: katvā dinnattā pītipāmojjaṃjanayitvā balava saddhāya dinnattā deyyadhammassa niravasesaṃ paribhogaṃ gatattāti
anya-e1202n:677_3: imehi pañcahi kāraṇehi mahantatti vatvā mahārāja kaṅgu ambili piṇḍagāhakattheresu maliyamahādevatthero
anya-e1202n:677_4: samantakūṭe pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ datvā paribhuñji pathavi cālanaka dhammaguttatthero kalyāṇīya vihāre
anya-e1202n:678_0: Talaṅgaravāsī dhammaguttattheropi piyaṅgudīpe dvādasannaṃ bhikkhusahassānaṃ datvā paribhuñji.
anya-e1202n:678_1: Maṅgaṇavāsī cuḷatissatthero kelāsakūṭe vihāre saṭṭhisahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ datvā paribhuñji mahābhaggattheropi
anya-e1202n:678_2: ukkānagara vihāre sattasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ datvā paribhuñji saraka bhattagāhakatthero pana piyaṅgudīpe
anya-e1202n:678_3: dvādasannaṃ bhikkhusahassānaṃ datvā paribhogamakāsīti vatvā rañño cittaṃ hāsesi.
anya-e1202n:679_1: ahambhante catuvīsati vassāni rajjaṃ kārento bhikkhusaṅghassa pahūpakāro ahosiṃ.
anya-e1202n:679_2: Kāyopi me saṅghassa upakārako hotu saṅghadāsassa me sarīraṃ mahācetiyassa dassanaṭṭhāne saṅghassa kammamālake jhāpethāti.
anya-e1202n:679_3: Tato kaniṭṭhaṃ āmantetvā’tāta! Tissa! Mahāthūpe aniṭṭhitaṃ kammaṃ sādhukaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1202n:679_4: Sāyaṃ pāto ca mahāthūpe pupphapūjaṃ kāretvā tikkhattuṃ upahāraṃ kārehi.
anya-e1202n:679_5: Mayā ṭhapitaṃ dānavaṭṭaṃ sabbaṃ aparihāpetvā saṅghassa kattabbakiccesu sadā appamatto hohī’ti anusāyitvā tuṇhi ahosi.
anya-e1202n:680_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bhikkhu gaṇasajjhāyaṃ ārabhiṃsu devatā pana chadeva lokato cha rathe gahetvā ādāya paṭipāṭiyā
anya-e1202n:680_2: amhākaṃ devaloko ramaṇīyoti vatvā attano attano devalokaṃ āgamanatthāya yāciṃsu rājā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā yāvāhaṃ dhammaṃ suṇāmi-
anya-e1202n:680_3: tāva adhivāsethāti te hatthasaññāya nivāresi saṅgho gaṇasajjhāyaṃ nivāresīti maññitvā sajjhāyaṃ ṭhapāpesi.
anya-e1202n:681_0: Rājā kasmā bhante gaṇasajjhāyaṃ ṭhapethāti āha.
anya-e1202n:681_3: Devatā chadevalokato cha rathe ānetvā attano attano devalokaṃ gantuṃ yācanti tasmā tesaṃ yāvāhaṃ dhammaṃ
anya-e1202n:681_4: suṇāmi tāva āgamethāti saññaṃ adāsinti taṃ sutvā keci ayaṃ rājā maraṇabhayabhito vippalapati,
anya-e1202n:681_5: maraṇato abhāyanaka satto nāma natthīti maññiṃsu.
anya-e1202n:682_0: Tato abhayatthero āha kathaṃ mahārāja saddahituṃ sakkā cha devalokato cha rathā ānītāti taṃ sutvā rājā ākāse pupphadāmāni khipāpesi.
anya-e1202n:682_1: Tāni gantvā visuṃ rathadhure olambiṃsu mahājano ākāse olambantāni pupphadāmāni disvā nikkaṅkho ahosi.
anya-e1202n:683_3: buddhabhāvāya samayaṃ olokento metteyyo bodhisattopi tasmiṃyeva vasatīti āha.
anya-e1202n:684_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā tasmiṃ ālayaṃ katvā mahāthūpaṃ olokento nipannova cavitvā suttappabuddho viya tusita bhavanato āhaṭa.
anya-e1202n:684_1: Rathe nibbattitvā attano katapuññassa thalaṃ mahājanassa pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ ratheyeva ṭhatvā dibbābharaṇa
anya-e1202n:684_2: vibhūsito mahājanassa passantasseva tikkhattuṃ mahāthūpaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghañca vaṇditvā
anya-e1202n:685_0: Evaṃ asāre nicaye dhanānaṃ aniccasaṅghaṃ sattaṃ sapaññā,
anya-e1202n:686_0: Katvana cāgaṃ ratanattayamahi ādāya sāraṃ sugatiṃ vajanti;
anya-e1202n:687_0: Rañño nāṭakatthiyo matabhāvaṃ ñatvā yattha ṭhitā makuḷaṃ mocayiṃsu tatthaṃ ṭhāne katasālā makuḷamuttasālānāmajātā.
anya-e1202n:687_1: Rañño sarīrasmiṃ citakaṃ āropite yattha mahājano hatthe paggahetvā viraci.
anya-e1202n:687_5: Atha rañño kaniṭṭhabhātā saddhātissamahārājā nāma hutvā cetiye aniṭṭhataṃ jattakammaṃ sudhākammañca niṭṭhāpetvā thūpamakāsīti
anya-e1202n:688_0: Iti sādhujana manopasādanatthāya kate thūpavaṃse mahācetiye katā niṭṭhitā.
anya-e1202n:689_1: Etarahi duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhaya mahārājassa pitā kākavaṇṇatissa rājā metteyyassa bhagavato pitā bhavissati.
anya-e1202n:689_6: Rañño putto sāli rājakumāro putto bhavissati.
anya-e1202n:689_7: Bhaṇḍāgārika saṅghāmacco aggupaṭṭhāko bhavissati tassāmaccassa dhītā aggupaṭṭhāyikā bhavissatīti evaṃ
anya-e1202n:689_8: sabbepi katādhikārā hetu sampannā tassa bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā dukkhassantaṃ karitvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
anya-e1202n:698_0: Yaṃ pattaṃ kusalaṃ kammaṃ karontena imaṃ mayaṃ,
anya-e1202n:699_0: Tena etena puññena sattā gacchantu nibbutiṃ;
anya-e1202n:707_0: Dhīmatā sukatā yena suṭṭhu sīhaḷa bhāsato
